children.text: mārā māra-vadhū-stanāś ca na dadhuḥ kṣobhaṃ sa vo 'vyāj jinaḥ
ste devāḥ pratibimbanās tridaśatāṃ suvyaktam āpedire
kāma-krodhau dvayam api yadi pratyanīkaṃ prasiddhaṃ
hatvānaṅgaṃ kim iva hi ruṣā sādhitaṃ try-ambakena
yas tu kṣāntyā śamayati śataṃ manmathādīna-rātīn
kalyāṇaṃ vo diśatu sa muni-grāmaṇīr arka-bandhuḥ
śreyāṃsi vaḥ sa sugataḥ kurutād apāra
yas tv enaṃ sabalaṃ ca jetum abhitas tat-kampa-mātraṃ bhruvo
rnārebhe sugatas tu tad-guṇa-kathā stambhāya naḥ kevalam
ke 'py utkarṣaṃ stuvanti smaram api jayatas tad vadāmaḥ kim asmin
pāyād vaḥ samayaḥ sa māra-jayino bandhyāyitāstrotkaraḥ
vyākoṣaḥ kusumāñjalir diśatu vaḥ śreyo nijāyārpitaḥ
sukhaṃ tad vaḥ śāstur diśatu śivam ajñāna-rajanī
pāyād vaḥ sphuṭa-bāṣpa-kampa-pulakaṃ ratyā jino vanditaḥ
ka ekas tvaṃ puṣpāyudha mama samādhi-vyayavidhau
suparvāṇaḥ sarve yadi kusuma-śastrās tad api kim
itīvainān nūnaṃ ya iha sumano 'stratvam anayat
sa vaḥ śāstā śastraṃ diśatu daśa-diṅ-māra-vijayī
tṛṣārtānām īṣad vitataṃ adharāntaḥ prati gati
praṇālībhiḥ pañcābhavad iti kiṃ anyad bhuja-karāt
ravim iva dhṛtāmitābhaṃ kavim iva surasārtha-viracita-stotram /
madhum iva saṃbhṛta-karuṇaṃ vidhum iva nāthaṃ kha-sarpaṇaṃ vande //
udarasyedam aṇutvaṃ sahaja-gurutvaṃ yadi nedaṃ hṛdayasya /
svārthe katham alasatvaṃ katham anusatvaṃ hita-karaṇe matir asya //
vaktraṃ naiṣa kalānidhir dhavalimā naiṣojjvalā kaumudī
netre nīra-rucī na lāñchana-yugaṃ candre 'sty amanda-cchavi
ity unnīya vidhor abhīti-vihasad yat saṃnidhiṃ sādhvagān
nūnaṃ nīrajam astu vaḥ śiva-dive tad lokanāthānanam
śrutaṃ no nāmāpi kva nu khalu himāṃśu-prakṛtayaḥ
mamābhyarṇe dhārṣṭyāc carati punar indīvaram iti
śilpaṃ trīṇi jaganti yasya kavitā yasya trivedī guror
yaś cakre tripura-vyayaṃ tripathagā yan-mūrdhni mālyāyate
trīn kālān iva vīkṣituṃ vahati yo visphūrjad-akṣṇāṃ trayaṃ
bhadraṃ candra-kale śivaṃ suranadi śreyaḥ kapālaāvale
ity āhur militāḥ parasparam amūr yasmin praśāntiṃ gate
kapāntāra-bhaṭī-naṭasya bhavatāt tad vaḥ śriye tāṇḍavam
paśya vyomani lohitāyati śanair eṣā daśā vartate
kasmāt pārvati niṣṭhurāsi sahaja śailīdbhavānām idaṃ
niḥsnehāsi kuto na bhasma-paruṣaḥ snehaṃ kvacin nindati
kopas te mayi niṣphalaḥ priyatame sthāṇau phalaṃ kiṃ bhaved
itthaṃ nirvacanīkṛto dayitayā śambhuḥ śivāyās tu vaḥ
vapuḥ prādurbhāvād anumitam idaṃ janmani purā
purāre na prāyaḥ kvacid api bhavantaṃ praṇatavān
naman janmany asminn aham atanur agre 'py anatibhāṅ
maheśa kṣantavyaṃ tad idam aparādha-dvayam api
śeṣaḥ so 'py agamad yad-aṅgada-padaṃ tasmai namaḥ śambhave
netraiḥ piṅgogra-tārais tribhir iva ravibhiś chidritaḥ kāla-meghaḥ
śambhor vaktraṃ suvaktra-tritaya-bhaya-karaṃ hantv adhaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ vaḥ
majjati punar unmajjati candra-kalā yatra śapharīva //
smarārer yo mūrdhni jvalana-kapiśe bhāti nihitaḥ
cyutām indor lekhāṃ ratikalaha-bhagnaṃ ca valayaṃ
avocad yaṃ paśyedty avatu sa śivaḥ sā ca girijā
gṛhṇan keśeṣv apāstaś caraṇa-nipatito nekṣitaḥ saṃbhrameṇa
kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ śāmbhavo vaḥ śarāgniḥ
yeṣām ucchalatāṃ javena jhagiti vyūheṣu bhūmībhṛtām
uḍḍīneṣu viḍaujasā punar asau dambholir ālokitaḥ
māṃse mandāyamānaḥ kṣarad-asṛji sṛjann asthiṣu ṣṭhātkṛtāni
lolat-kuntala-kuṇḍalasya śirasaḥ śobhāṃ sa vo dhūrjaṭiḥ
śāntyai vo 'stu kapāla-dāma jagatāṃ patur yadīyāṃ lipiṃ
kvāpi kvāpi gaṇāḥ paṭhanti padaśo nāti-prasiddhākṣaram
viśvaṃ srakṣyati rakṣati kṣitim apām īśiṣyate śiṣyate
nāgau rāgiṣu raṃsyate syati jagan nirvekṣyati dyām iti
ātmany ātmānam eva vyapagata-karaṇaṃ paśyatas tattva-dṛṣṭyā
mātar jīva kim etad añjali-puṭe tātena gopāyitaṃ
vatsa svādu-phalaṃ prayacchati na me gatvā gṛhāṇa svayam
mātraivaṃ prahite guhe vighaṭayaty ākṛṣya saṃdhyāñjaliṃ
evaṃ sthāpaya subhru bāhu-latikām evaṃ kuru sthānakaṃ
nātyuccair nama kuñcitāgra-caraṇaṃ māṃ paśya tāvat kṣaṇam
vṛṣaḥ śāṭhyaṃ kṛtvā vilikhati khurāgreṇa nayanaṃ
sāścaryaṃ viṣamekṣaṇo 'yam iti ca trastaṃ kapālīti ca
pārvatyā sabhayaṃ bhujaṅga-valayīty ālokitaḥ pātu vaḥ
yaḥ śaktyā samalaṃkṛto 'pi śaśinaṃ śrī-śailajāṃ svardhunīṃ
dhatte kautuka-rāja-nīti-nipuṇaḥ pāyāt sa vaḥ śaṅkaraḥ
devī sūnum asūta nṛtyata gaṇāḥ kiṃ tiṣṭhatety udbhuje
bho bho dik-patayaḥ prayāta parataḥ khaṃ muñcatāmbhomucaḥ
pātālaṃ vraja medini praviśata kṣoṇī-talaṃ kṣmābhṛtaḥ
brahmann unnaya dūram ātma-sadanaṃ devasya me nṛtyataḥ
śambhoḥ saṃkaṭam etad ity avatu vaḥ protsāraṇā nandinaḥ
svedas te katham īdṛśaḥ priyatame tvan-netra-vahner vibho
kasmāt kampitam etad induvadane bhogīndra-bhīter bhava
romāñcaḥ katham eṣa devi bhagavan gaṅgāmbhasāṃ śīkarar
itthaṃ bhartari bhāva-gopana-parā gaurī ciraṃ pātu vaḥ
ārdrāṃ kaṇṭhe mukhābja-srajam avanamayaty ambikā jānulambāṃ
sthāne kṛtvendulekhāṃ nibiḍayati jaṭāḥ pannagendreṇa nandī
kālaḥ kṛttiṃ nibadhnāty upanayati kare kāla-rātriḥ kapālaṃ
śambhor nṛtyāvatāre pariṣad iti pṛthag vyāpṛtā vaḥ punātu
śṛṅgaṃ bhṛṅgin vimuñca tyaja gaja-vadana tvaṃ ca lāṅgūla-mūlaṃ
mandānando 'si nandinn alam abala mahākāla kaṇṭha-graheṇa
ity uktvā nīyamānaḥ sukhayatu vṛṣabhaḥ pārvatī-pāda-mūle
paśyann akṣair vilakṣaṃ valita-gala-calat-kambalaṃ tryambakaṃ vaḥ
udyātān apahāya vigraham iha srotaḥ-pratīpān api
srotas tīvrataratvarā gamayati drāg brahmalokaṃ janān
gaurī-mātuḥ kim api kim api vyāhṛtaṃ karṇa-mūle
devyāḥ sthāṇau caraṇa-patite te nakhāḥ pāntu viśvam
miśrībhūtāṃ tava tanulatāṃ bibhrato gauri kāmaṃ
vaināyakyaś ciraṃ vo vadana-vidhutayaḥ pāntu cītkāra-vatyaḥ
yad ambā tāto vā dvayam idam agād eka-tanutāṃ
tad-ardhaṃ cārdhaṃ ca kva nu gatam athāryaḥ kathayatu
jagat tat taj jātaṃ sakala-nara-nārī-mayam iti
vṛddha-strī-vacanāt priye vinihitaḥ puṣpāñjaliḥ pātu vaḥ
śikhipatir atidurlaḍitaḥ pitror abhilaṣati madhyam adhiśayitum /
tāv apy eka-śarīrāv iti viṣamāśaś ciraṃ jayati //
ambeyaṃ neyam ambā na hi khara-kapiśaṃ śmaśru tasyā mukhārdhe
tāto 'yaṃ naiṣa tātaḥ stanaṃ urasi pitur dṛṣṭavān nāham atra
keyaṃ ko 'yaṃ kiṃ etad yuvatir atha pumān vastu kiṃ syāt tṛtīyaṃ
śambhoḥ saṃvīkṣya rūpād apasarati guhaḥ śaṅkitaḥ pātu yuṣmān
kampī pāyād apāyāj jvalita-śikhi-śikhe cakṣuṣi nyasta-hastaḥ
pāyād vaḥ pitur aṅka-bhāk śiśu-jana-krīḍonmukhaḥ ṣaṇ-mukhaḥ
vācaḥ śaktidharasya śaiśava-kalāḥ kurvantu vo maṅgalam
suptaṃ pakṣa-puṭe nilīna-śirasaṃ sṛṣṭvā mayūraṃ puraḥ
kṛttaṃ kena śiro 'sya tāta katham ity ākrandataḥ śaiśavāt
carcāyāḥ katham eṣa rakṣati sadā sadyo nṛ-muṇḍa-srajaṃ
caṇḍīkeśariṇo vṛṣaṃ ca bhujagān sūnor mayūrād api
ity antaḥparibhāvayan bhagavato dīrghaṃ dhiyaḥ kauśalaṃ
kasmāt tvaṃ tāta gehād aparam abhinavā brūhi kā tatra vārtā
ity evaṃ barhināthe kathayati sahasā bhartṛ-bhikṣā vibhūṣā
vaiguṇyodvega-janmā jagad avatu ciraṃ hāravo bhṛṅgirīṭeḥ
sthūlo dūramayaṃ na yāsyati kṛśo naiṣa prayāṇa-kṣamas
tenaikasya mamaiva tatra kaśipu-prāptiḥ parā dṛśyate
yātas te 'dhara-khaṇḍanāt paribhavaḥ kāpālikād amba yaḥ
sa brahmādiṣu kathyatām iti muhur vāṇīṃ guhe jalpati
pāṇisthāya viṣāya vīryamahate kaṇṭhe maṇiṃ bibhratī
rakṣatv adri-sutā vivāha-samaye prītā ca bhītā ca vaḥ
dig-vāsā yadi tat kim asya dhanuṣā sāstrasya kiṃ bhasmanā
bhasmāṅgasya kim aṅganā yadi ca sā kāmaṃ paridveṣṭi kim
nidrāloḥ kamaṭhākṛter bhagavataḥ śvāsānilāḥ pāntu vaḥ
kim adhikaraṇā kīdṛk kasya vyavasthitir ity asā
vudaram aviśad draṣṭuṃ tasmai jagan-nidhaye namaḥ
rādhe tvaṃ kupitā tvam eva kupitā ruṣṭāsi bhūmer yato
mātā tvaṃ jagatāṃ tvam eva jagatāṃ mātā na vijño 'paraḥ
devi tvaṃ parihāsa-keli-kalahe 'nantā tvam evety asau
smero vallava-sundarīm avanamac chauriḥ śriyaḥ vaḥ kriyāt
ko 'yaṃ dvāri hariḥ prayāhy upavanaṃ śākhāmṛgeṇātra kiṃ
kṛṣṇo 'haṃ dayite bibhemi sutarāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ kathaṃ vānaraḥ
mugdhe 'haṃ madhusūdano vraja latāṃ tām eva puṣpāsavām
itthaṃ nirvacanīkṛto dayitayā hrīṇo hariḥ pātu vaḥ
niryāto vadanena kukṣi-vasateḥ patyus talād arṇasāṃ
yair vyāvṛtya patadbhir aurva-śikhinas tejo-jaṭālaṃ vapuḥ
kutas tvam aṇukaḥ svataḥ svam iti kiṃ na yat kasyacit
kim icchasi pada-trayaṃ nanu bhuvā kim ity alpayā
dvijasya śamino mama tribhuvanaṃ tad ity āśayo
harer jayati nihnutaḥ prakaṭitaś ca vakroktibhiḥ
śreyo 'syāś ciram astu mandara-girer māghāni pāśrvair iyaṃ
ity ākūta-juṣaḥ śriyaṃ jala-nidher ardhotthitāṃ paśyato
vācontaḥ-sphuritā bahir vikṛtibhir vyaktā hareḥ pātu vaḥ
dhagad-dhag iti medasi sphuṭataro 'sthiṣu ṣṭhād iti
bhramati girirāṭ pṛṣṭhe garjaty upaśruti sāgaro
yuṣmākaṃ kurutāṃ bhavārti-śamanaṃ netre tanur vā hareḥ
madhye-sindhu viyan-mayo jala-mayaḥ stambhas tv abhūd ambare
mayānviṣṭo dhūrtaḥ sa sakhi nikhilām eva rajanīm
iha syād atra syād iti nipuṇam anyām abhisṛtaḥ
na dṛṣṭo bhāṇḍīre taṭa-bhuvi na govardhana-girer
na kālindyāḥ kūle na ca nicula-kuñje muraripuḥ
śyāmoccandrā svapiti na śiśo naiti mām amba nidrā
nidrāhetoḥ śṛṇu suta kathāṃ kām apūrvāṃ kuruṣva
vyaktaḥ stambhān naraharir abhūd dānavaṃ dārayiṣyann
uttiṣṭhantyā ratānte bharam uragapatau pāṇinaikena kṛtvā
dhṛtvā cānyena vāso vigalita-kabarī-bhāram aṃśaṃ vahantyāḥ
śayyām ālambya nītaṃ vapur alasa-lasad-bāhu lakṣmyāḥ punātu
vara-ruceḥ (Sksa.ka.ā. 2.33, V 165, Vs 1.3; Skmsa.u.ka. 339, Svsu.ā. 79, Spdśā.pa. 135)
saṃpūrṇaḥ punar abhyudeti kiraṇair indus tato dantinaḥ
kṣīrābdher mathane 'bhavad-diviṣadāṃ lakṣmīr asāv astu vaḥ
kṛ-kṛṣṇa vavada drutaṃ ha-ha-hasanti kiṃ vṛṣṇayaḥ
mada-skhalitam ālapan hala-dharaḥ śriyaḥ vaḥ kriyāt
kiṃ kiṃ siṃhas tataḥ kiṃ nara-sadṛśa-vapur deva citraṃ gṛhīto
naivaṃ tat ko 'tra jīva drutam upanaya taṃ nanv ayaṃ prāpta eva
cāpaṃ cāpaṃ na khaḍgaṃ tvaritataram aho karkaśatvaṃ nakhānām
itthaṃ daityādhirājaṃ nija-nakha-kuliśair jaghnivān yas sa vo 'vyāt
ete lakṣmaṇa jānakī-virahiṇaṃ māṃ khedayanty ambudā
marmāṇīva ca ghaṭṭayanty alam amī krūrāḥ kadambānilāḥ
serṣyaṃ śaṅkitayā sa vaḥ sukhayatu svapnāyamāno hariḥ
ye nidrāṃ nāṭayadbhiḥ śayana-phaṇi-phaṇair lakṣitā na śrutāś ca
ye ca dhyānānubandha-cchala-mukula-dṛśā vedhasā naiva dṛṣṭās
te lakṣmīṃ narmayanto nidhuvana-vidhayaḥ pāntu vo mādhavasya
nidrā-cchedābhitāmrā ciram avatu harer dṛṣṭir ākekarā vaḥ
daṃṣṭrāpiṣṭeṣu sadyaḥ śikhariṣu na kṛtaḥ skandha-kaṇḍū-vinodaḥ
yenoddhāre dharitryāḥ sa jayati vibhutā-vighniteccho varāhaḥ
gāḍhāntar-davathoḥ pratapta-saralāḥ śvāsā hareḥ pāntu vaḥ
seyaṃ dyos tad idaṃ śaśāṅka-dina-kṛc-cihnaṃ nabhaḥ sā kṣitis
tat-pātāla-talaṃ ta eva girayas te 'mbhodharās tā diśaḥ
yasyāntaś ca bahiś ca dṛṣṭam akhilaṃ trailokyam avyāt sa vaḥ
bhaktām apy avadhūya kartum adhunā kāntā-sahasraṃ tava
ity uktvā phaṇa-bhṛt phaṇāmaṇi-gatāṃ svām eva matvā tanuṃ
nidrā-ccheda-karaṃ harer avatu vo lakṣmyā vilakṣa-smitam
agre gacchata dhenu-dugdha-kalaśān ādāya gopyo gṛhaṃ
dugdhe vaskayaṇī-kule punar iyaṃ rādhā śanair yāsyati
devaḥ kāraṇa-nanda-sūnur aśivaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ sa muṣṇātu vaḥ
hiṃsrān vīkṣya puraḥ purāṇa-puruṣaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ dhyāsyasi
ity uktasya yaśodayā murāripor avyāj jaganti sphurad
bījaṃ brahmaiva devo madhujala-nidhayaḥ karṇikā svarṇa-śailaḥ
kando nāgādhirājo viyad api vipulaḥ patrakośāvakāśaḥ
dvīpāḥ patrāṇi meghā madhupakulam abhūt tārakā-garbha-dhūlir
yasyaitan-nābhi-padmaṃ bhuvanam iti sa vaḥ śarma devo dadhātu
yasyādhodhas tathoparyupari niravadhi bhrāmyato viśvam aśvair
uddaṇḍaiḥ prāpayan vaḥ pracuratama-tamaḥ-stomam astaṃ samastam
arkālokaḥ kriyād vo mudaṃ udaya-śiraś cakravālālavālād
cittenopahṛtaḥ smarāya na samutsraṣṭuṃ gataḥ pāṇinā
āmṛṣṭo muhur īkṣito muhur abhighrāto muhur loṭhitaḥ
pratyaṅgaṃ ca muhuḥ kṛto mṛgadṛśā kiṃ kiṃ na cūtāṅkuraḥ
dvis triḥ kokilayā rutaṃ tri-caturaiś cūtāṅkurair udgataṃ
kīrāḥ pakva-phalāśayā madhu-karīś cumbanti muñcanti ca
eteṣām api paśya kiṃśukataroḥ patrair abhinna-tviṣāṃ
yāḥ kṛcchrād abhilaṅghya lubdhaka-bhayāt tair eva reṇūtkarair
dalati kalikā cautī nāsmin tathā mṛga-cakṣuṣāṃ
atha ca hṛdaye māna-granthiḥ svayaṃ śithilāyate
māṃ ullaṅghya vrajatu pathikaḥ kāpi yady asti śaktiḥ
ity āśokī jagati sakale vallarī cīrikeva
vardhante ca vivardhayanti ca muhus te 'mī smaraṃ vāsarāḥ
pratyāvṛtto madhur iti vadan dakṣiṇo gandhavāhaḥ
manasi ca giraṃ grathnantīme kiranti na kokilāḥ
atha ca savituḥ śītollāsaṃ lunanti marīcayo
sāmyaṃ saṃprati sevate vicakilaṃ ṣāṇmāsikair mauktikair
māñjiṣṭhair mukulaiś ca pāṭalitaror anyaiva kācil lipiḥ
kiṃ ca trīṇi jaganti jiṣṇu-divasair dvitrair manojanmano
devasyāpi cirojjhitaṃ yadi bhaved abhyāsa-vaśyaṃ dhanuḥ
śītās tair iva bhagna-śaiśira-niśā-bhāgair ahaḥ sphāyate
garbhaṃ bibhrati kiṃśukā iva diśāṃ tāpāya vahny-aṅkuram
lokaḥ stoka-raso 'dya na kvacid api svacchandam ānandati
prāg eva jaitram astraṃ sahakāra-latā smarasya cāpabhṛtaḥ /
krīḍā-veśmasu kāminaḥ kuśalayaty etac ca vaktītarat
kaṇṭha-dhvāna-juṣo haranti hṛdayaṃ madhye vanaṃ kokilāḥ
cūtānāṃ kalikāmilan madhulihāṃ kāpi sthitir vartate
kiṃ cānyat kusumāyudho 'dya bhagavān dhatte sa-garvaṃ dhanur
jyām unmārṣṭi ca pañcabhiś ca viśikhair jetuṃ jagad vāñchati
tān dhunvann ayam abhyupaiti madhurāmodo marud dakṣiṇaḥ
śyāmaṃ dhūmaiḥ sa khalu kurute kānanaṃ korakākhyaiḥ
śikī-mukhair adya manojña-pakṣair viṣopalepād iva kajjalābhaiḥ /
nitānta-pūrṇā mucakundakoṣā vibhānti tūṇā iva manmathasya //
snehaṃ sravanti taravaḥ pañcāpi kṣipati mārgaṇān madanaḥ /
saṃpraty uparamati hime kramaśo divasāḥ prasāra-juṣaḥ //
sadyas tapto bhramati rajanīṃ vāsaraḥ khaṇḍayitvā
kṣīṇa-kṣīṇā tad anu bhajate sāpi saṃyak-prasādam
nāryāḥ puṃsi sthitim anuguṇāṃ śaṃsati spaṣṭam anyā
tataḥ strīṇāṃ hanta kṣamam adhara-kāntiṃ kalayituṃ
re saṃpraty apavitram atra pathikāḥ sārambham ujjṛmbhate
ito 'sty eṣa śrīmān aviralam idānīṃ mukulitaḥ
aṅkurite pallavite korakite vikasite ca sahakare /
aṅkuritaḥ pallavitaḥ korakito vikasitaś ca madano 'sau //
jātaṃ dhūsaram eva kiṃśuka-taror āśyāmalaṃ jālakam
strīṇāṃ pīna-ghana-staneṣu kaṇavān svedaḥ karoty āspadam
sapadi sakhībhir nibhṛtaṃ virahavatīs trātum atra bhajyante /
viśleṣo janitaḥ priyair api janair ujjṛmbhitaṃ nālikair
gurvī vallabhatā jaḍair adhigatā doṣākaraḥ sevyate
hā kālaḥ kim ayaṃ kalir na hi na hi prāptaḥ sa gharmāgamaḥ
pravṛddha-tāpo divaso 'timātram atyartham eva kṣaṇadā ca tanvī /
ubhau virodha-kriyayā vibhinnau jāyāpatī sānuśayāv iva staḥ //
jyeṣṭhe māsi kharārka-tejasi kathaṃ pāntha vrajan jīvasi
samagroṣmā cūtaṃ pacati picu-mardaṃ ca divasaḥ
vāyuḥ sañcāriṇa iva likhaty ānane dig-vadhūnāṃ
dhāsyaty adya sitātapatra-subhagaṃ sā rājahaṃsī śiśoḥ
na ḍaukante pātuḥ jhaṭiti makarandaṃ madhulihaḥ
tāpaṃ stamberamasya prakaṭayati karaḥ śīkaraiḥ kukṣum ukṣat
paṅkāṅkaṃ palvalānāṃ vahati taṭa-vanaṃ māhiṣaiḥ kāya-kāṣaiḥ
agre tapta-jalāḥn nitāntaśiśirā mūle muhur bāhubhiḥ
strīṇām aṅge vibhajati tapas tatra tatrātma-cihnam
bhavanti ca himopamāḥ stana-bhuvo yad eṇī-dṛśāṃ
śucer upari saṃsthito rati-pateḥ prasādo guruḥ
vyāptāny unmada-kukkubhāni saritāṃ kurvanti lolaṃ manaḥ
kāntāṃ kvāpi vilambinīṃ kalarutair āhūya bhūyas tataḥ
digbhāgān avalokya raṅga-vasudhām utsṛjya padbhyāṃ tataḥ
cubhrūś cubhrur iti bhramanti rabhasād udyāyi-matsyotsukāḥ
na pratyemi janasya yad virahiṇo yāsyanti soḍhuṃ niśāḥ
staimityaṃ manaso diśaty anibhṛtaṃ dhārādhare mūrcchati
utsaṅge kakubho nidhāya rasitair ambhomucāṃ ghorayan
vyāmohād apibann apaḥ sphuṭam amī tarṣeṇa paryāvilāḥ
kṛtvā picchilatāṃ pathaḥ sthagayatā nirbhartsanaṃ pādayoḥ
meghenopakṛtaṃ yad āśu vihitā tasyāgaso niṣkṛtiḥ
kvāmagnaṃ sthalam asti nāma tad ibhīvoddāma-saudāminī
pārśvābhyāṃ śirasā nimīlita-dṛśaḥ kāmaṃ nimajya kramād
aṃsau pṛṣṭham uraḥ sa-pakṣati-talaṃ gāḍhaṃ spṛśanto muhuḥ
majjānam api vilimpati nākṛta-puṇyasya varṣati payode /
antar me dayitā-mukhaṃ tava śaśī vṛttiḥ samaivāvayos
tat kiṃ mām aniśaṃ sakhe jaladhara tvaṃ dagdhum evodyataḥ
bhuvaḥ kim etā divam utpatanti divo 'thavā bhū-talam āviśanti /
calāḥ sthirā veti vitarkayantyo dhārāḥ karāgrair abalāḥ spṛśanti //
adyāmbhaḥ paritaḥ patiṣyati bhuvas tāpo 'dya nirvāsyati
kṣetreṣv adya yatiṣyate janapadaḥ sasyeṣu paryutsukaḥ
gāyati hi nīlakaṇṭho nṛtyati gaurī taḍit tarala-tārā /
kāle vāri-dharāṇām apatitayā naiva śakyate sthātum /
utkaṇṭhitāsi tarale na hi na hi sakhi picchilaḥ panthāḥ //
stambeṣu ketakīnāṃ yathottaraṃ vāmanair dalair adya /
prāṇān pāntha kathaṃ dadhāsi nivasann etādṛśi prāvṛṣi
kva saṃpraty uṣṇāṃśur gata iti samanveṣaṇa-parās
kasyacit (Skmsa.u.ka. 1287 oṅkaṇṭhasya, Spdśā.pa. 3869, Smvsū.mu. 61.18 both pāṇineḥ)
asau nāstīvenduḥ kvacid api raviḥ proṣita iva
ahar vā rātrir vā dvayam api vilupta-pravicayaṃ
ghanair baddha-vyūhaiḥ kim idam iti ghoraṃ vyavasitam
tāvad vācaḥ prayuktā manasi vinihitā jīvitāśāpi tāvan
vikṣiptau tāvad aṅghrī pathi pathika-janair lambitā tāvad āśā
phullad-dhārā-kadambas tava kavalayitā yāvad ete na dṛṣṭā
ity uccakaiḥ śarad iyaṃ vahatīva tāpam
dhūmraiḥ pakṣa-puṭaiḥ patadbhir abhitaḥ pāṇḍūdaraiḥ khañjanair
āyāntīṃ śaradaṃ kiranti rabhasāl lājair ivāśāṅganāḥ
vidadhati na ced utkaṇṭhārdraṃ śaran maṇi-nūpura
smarasyoccair mantraṃ kim api japatāṃ huṅkṛtim iyam
kaṃcit kālaṃ naṭati nikaṭe khañjarīṭaḥ priyāyāḥ
kāmī daridra iva śoṣam upaiti paṅkaḥ
nabhastaḥ syandante sarita iva dīrghā daśa diśaḥ
kedārebhyaḥ praṇālaiḥ praviśati śapharī-paṅktir ādhāram ārād
acchaḥ kaccheṣu paṅkaḥ sukhayati saritām ātapād ukṣa-pālam
sadyaḥ-snātānuliptā iva dadhati rucaṃ pallavāḥ kardamāṅkāḥ
haṃsānāṃ ninadeṣu yaiḥ kavalitair āsajyate kūjatām
yā sīmante maṇibhir aruṇaiḥ sā cchavir bandhu-jīvair
veśaḥ śobhāṃ diśati paramām ārtavaḥ śāli-gopyāḥ
āḍhyān nivāpalambho niketa-gāmī ca picchilaḥ panthāḥ /
saṃpraty utsukayanti kasya na manaḥ pūga-drumāṇāṃ chaṭāḥ
garvāyante palālaṃ prati pathika-śataiḥ pāmarāḥ stūyamānā
tyaktvā śāli-cikartiṣām ita ito dhāvanty amī pāmarāḥ
ūrvor antarayor niṣeduṣi karau kṛtvā kukūlānale
prātar no na ca sāyam adya jaratī gehodaraṃ muñcati
mūle harinti kiṃcit pārśve pītāni lohitāny agre /
sthāne rūpam anuttamaṃ sukṛtinā dānena karṇo jitaḥ
ity ālokya ciraṃ dṛśā kṛpaṇayā dūrāgatena stutaḥ
kundasyāpi na pūjana-vyatikare nāpy ātmano maṇḍane
jāḍyābaddhān tvarayitum ayaṃ drāṅ na śaknoti pādān
pānthasyārāt kṣaṇam iva gater mandimānaṃ diśanti
kṣīyante suratāntare 'pi na dṛśāṃ pātrīkṛtāṃ kāmibhiḥ
tiṣṭhadbhiḥ parivārya bandhubhir iva snigdhaiḥ kṛtāvekṣaṇam
kampante kapayo bhṛśaṃ jala-kṛśaṃ gojāvikaṃ glāyati
śvā cullīkuharodaraṃ kṣaṇam api kṣipto 'pi naivojjhati
śītārti-vyasanāturaḥ punar ayaṃ dīno janaḥ kūrvavat
svāny aṅgāni śarīra eva hi nije nihnotum ākāṅkṣati
ucchindanty adha eva bandhuratayā kolī-phalāny arbhakāḥ
koṇe koṇe khalānāṃ parisara-sa-kaṭuḥ kīryate ko 'pi gandhaḥ
māṣīṇaṃ muṣitaṃ yaveṣu yavasa-śyāmā cchaviḥ śīryate
anena kila nirjitā vayam iti prayāyāḥ karaṃ
cumbanto jagatāṃ manaḥ sumanaso marm-aspṛśaḥ sāyakāḥ
dārāḥ prīti-ratī iti kva mahimā kāmasya nālaukikaḥ
yenāsāv api bhasma-lāñchita-tanur devaḥ kapālī balāt
dhanur mālā maurvī kvaṇad-alikulaṃ lakṣyam abalā
iyāṃ jetuṃ yasya tribhuvanam adehasya vibhavaḥ
sa vaḥ kāmaḥ kāmān diśatu dayitāpāṅga-vasatiḥ
yācyo na kaścana guruḥ pratimā ca kāntā
bhruvoḥ kācil līlā pariṇatir apūrvā nayanayoḥ
idānīm bālāyāḥ kim amṛta-mayaḥ kim madhu-mayaḥ
kim ānandaḥ sākṣāt dhvanati madhuraḥ pañcama-layaḥ
strīṇāṃ glāyati śaiśave pratikalaṃ ko 'py eṣa keli-kramaḥ
vidhatte sollekhaṃ katarad iha nāṅgaṃ taruṇimā
tathāpi prāgalbhyaṃ kim api caturaṃ locana-yuge
yad ādatte dṛśyād akhilam api bhāva-vyatikaraṃ
mano-vṛttiṃ draṣṭuḥ prathayati ca dṛśyaṃ prati janam
prakāmaṃ pronmajjad vapur api ca tasyā vijayate
pratyāsīdati yauvane mṛga-dṛśaḥ kiṃ cānyad āvirbhaval
gehād bahir virama cāpalam astu dūram
premāsaṅgi ca bhaṅgi ca prativaco 'py uktaṃ ca guptaṃ tathā
yatnād yācitam ānanaṃ prati samādhāne ca hāne ca dhīḥ
ity anyo madhuraḥ sa ko 'pi śiśutā-tāruṇyayor antare
nitambaḥ svāṃ lakṣmīm abhilaṣati nādyāpi labhate
samantāt sābhogaṃ na ca kuca-vibhāgāñcitam uraḥ
dṛśor līlāmudrā sphurati ca na cāpi sthitimatī
tad asyās tāruṇyaṃ prathamam avatīrṇaṃ vijayate
stokārohiṇi yauvane mṛgadṛśaḥ ko 'py eṣa kelikramaḥ
pūrvākāram uras tathāpi kucayoḥ śobhāṃ navām īhate
no dhatte gurutāṃ tad apy upacitābhogā nitamba-sthalī
tasyāḥ sīdati śaiśave pratikalaṃ ko 'py eṣa keli-kramaḥ
tanvaṅgyās taruṇimni sarpati śanair anyaiva kācid gatiḥ
vāraṃ vāram anekadhā sakhi mayā cūta-drumāṇāṃ vane
tasminn adya punaḥ śruti-praṇayini pratyaṅgam utkampitaṃ
tāpaś cetasi netrayos taralimā kasmād akasmān mama
vapur muñcad bālyaṃ kim api kamanīyaṃ mṛga-dṛśaḥ
bālo 'dyāpi kileti lakṣitam alaṃkartuṃ nijair bhūṣaṇai
rāmābhiś ciram udyate hṛdi lihann icchām anicchāṃ vahan
smaronmeṣāḥ keṣām upari na rasānāṃ yuvatayaḥ
bhrū-līlā caturā tribhāga-valitā dṛṣṭir gatir mantharā
noddiṣṭaṃ guruṇā na bandhu-kathitaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na śāstre kvacid
saṃmugdho madhu-bāndhavaḥ sa bhagavān adyāpi nidrālasaḥ
caraś cakṣuḥ karṇe kathayitum agāt satvaram iva
parispando vācām api ca kucayoḥ sandhir abhavat
yat pratyaṅgaṃ sphuṭam anusaranty ūrmayo vibhramāṇāṃ
kṣobhaṃ dhatte yad api bahalaḥ snigdha-lāvaṇya-paṅkaḥ
unmagnaṃ yat sphurati ca manāk kumbhayor dvandvam etat
katham api haṭhād ākṛṣyānte paṭasya niveśitām
spṛśantyās tāruṇyaṃ kim iva na manojñaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ
asti bhayam asti kautukam asti ca mandākṣam asti cotkaṇṭhā /
bālānāṃ praṇayi-jane bhāvaḥ ko 'py eṣa naika-rasaḥ //
spṛhām antaḥ kānte vahati na samabhyeti nikaṭaṃ
yathaiveyaṃ bālā harati ca tathaiveyam adhikam
antar visphurati smaro bahir api vrīḍā samunmīlate
svairaṃ locana-vakrimā vilasati śrīḥ kācid ujjṛmbhate
sutanur adhunā seyaṃ nimnāṃ svanābhim abhīkṣate
api ca kim api vrīḍāṃ krīḍāsakhīm iva manyate
gatir mandā sāndraṃ jaghanam udaraṃ kṣāmam atanuḥ
stanābhogaḥ stokaṃ vacanam atimugdhaṃ ca hasitam
kva jātaṃ bālāyāḥ kva ca viṣayam akṣṇor iyam agāt
haratitarāṃ jana-hṛdayaṃ kalikopagatā latā ca dayitā ca /
yadi punar atanu-śilīmukha-samākulā kiṃ na paryāptam //
dhṛtam iva puraḥ paścāt kaiścit praṇunnam ivollasat
stana-taṭam idam uttuṅgaṃ nimno madhyaḥ samunnataṃ jaghanam /
iti viṣame hariṇākṣyā vapuṣi nave ka iha na skhalati //
asyā yaj jaghanaṃ ghanaṃ ca kalayā pratyaṅgam eṇīdṛśaḥ
ayi purāri parunmalayānilā vavur amī jagur eva ca kokilāḥ /
kalamalotkalitaṃ tu na me manaḥ sakhi babhūva vṛthaiva yathaiṣamaḥ //
dṛṣṭyā varjitam ārjavaṃ samatayā dattaṃ payo vakṣase
kṣīṇāyur gatiṣu tvarā smitam api bhrū-lāsya-līlā-sakham
satyā na prakṛtau guraḥ śiśutayā prasthāna-dattārghayā
yāsāṃ saty api sad-guṇānusaraṇe doṣānubandhaḥ sadā
yāḥ prāṇān varam arpayanti na punaḥ saṃpūrṇa-dṛṣṭiṃ priye
sāndraṃ candanam aṅgake valayitā pāṇau mṛṇālī-latā
tanvī naktam iyaṃ cakāsti śucinī cīnāṃśuke bibhratī
vāma-bhruvāṃ mṛdu ca mañju ca bhāṣitāni
dṛṣṭā kāñcana-yaṣṭir adya nagaropānte bhramantī mayā
tasyām adbhutam padmam ekam aniśaṃ protphullam ālokitam
tasyāgre paripuñjitena tamasā naktaṃ divaṃ sthīyate
prāptau tāla-phala-dvayaṃ tad anu tan niḥsandhi bhāva-sthitam
kāreṇa sphuṭam eva tat-pariṇataṃ kvedaṃ vadāmodbhutam
kva bālāyās te kva caṭula-kaṭākṣā naya-muṣaḥ
āścaryam ūrjitam idaṃ kim u kiṃ madīyaś
saṃkrānta-pratibimbam aindavam idaṃ dvedhā vibhaktaṃ vapuḥ
ghanāv ūrū tasyā yadi yadi vidagdho 'yam adharaḥ
stana-dvandvaṃ sāndraṃ yadi yadi mukhābjaṃ vijayate
hatau hemnaḥ kumbhāv ahaha vihataḥ pārvaṇa-śaśī
yad api vibudhaiḥ sindhor antaḥ kathaṃcid upārjitaṃ
tad api sakalaṃ cāru-strīṇāṃ mukheṣu vibhāvyate
amṛtam adhare tiryag-bhūte viṣaṃ ca vilocane
bhavatu mahimā lāvaṇyānām ayaṃ katham anyathā
so 'naṅgaḥ kusumāni pañca viśikhāḥ puṣpāṇi bāṇāsanaṃ
etat-sādhana utsaheta sa jagaj jetuṃ kathaṃ manmathas
tasyāmogham amūr bhavanti nahi ced astraṃ kuraṅgī-dṛśaḥ
jagaj jīrṇāraṇyaṃ katham asi vidhātuṃ vyavasitaḥ
bimbaṃ dehi nitambini tvad-alaka-śyāmaṃ ca me jāmbavam
dūrvā-śyāmo jayati pulakair eṣa kāntaḥ kapolaḥ
kastūrībhiḥ kim iha likhito drāviḍaḥ patra-bhaṅgaḥ
tatas tāṃ śreyobhiḥ pariṇatim asau vindati yayā
ruciṃ tanvan pīna-stani hṛdi tavāyaṃ vilasati
na nīlābjaṃ cakṣuḥ sarasiruham etan na vadanaṃ
mamāpy eṣā bhrāntiḥ prathamam abhavad bhṛṅga kim u te
kṛtaṃ yatnair ebhyo virama viramety añjalir ayam
tava mukham anukartuṃ tanvi vāñchā dvayoś ca
nūnaṃ na gocaram abhūd dayitānanaṃ vaḥ
nūnaṃ surālayam iti sphuṭam etad adya
tad evaṃ tanvaṅgyāḥ katham api nitamba-sthalam idaṃ
mayā labdhaṃ puṇyair iti raṇati kāñcī-parikaraḥ
nayana-cchalena sutanor vadana-jite śaśini kula-vibhau krodhāt /
cakṣur mecakam ambujaṃ vijayate vaktrasya mitraṃ śaśī
rekhā kāpi rada-cchade ca sutanor gātre ca tat kāminīṃ
enāṃ varṇayitā smaro yadi sa ced vaidarbhyam abhyasyati
kṣobhaṃ yad eti na manāg api tena manye
aye vīṇā-daṇḍa prakaṭaya phalaṃ kasya tapasaḥ
na cāmī te dantāḥ sudati jita-kundendu-mahasaḥ
tad etad līlābjaṃ śarad-amṛta-raśmiḥ sphuṭam ayam
kim aṅge tanvaṅgyāḥ kalayati jagat kāntam adhikaṃ
yad etasyāṃ śaśvat paravaśam ivonmattam iva ca
janānandaś candro bhavati na kathaṃ nāma sukṛtī
prayātovasthābhis tisṛbhir api yaḥ koṭim iyatīm
bhruvor līlāṃ bālaḥ śiryam alika-paṭṭasya taruṇo
iyaṃ gehe lakṣmīr iyam amṛta-vartir nayanayoḥ
asāv asyāḥ sparśo vapuṣi balahaś candana-rasaḥ
kim asyā na preyo yadi param asahyas tu virahaḥ
pravṛddhau nāmnā ca stana iti samānāv udayinau
mithaḥ sīmā-mātre yad idam anayor maṇḍalavator
rapi spardhā yuddhaṃ tad iha hi namasyaḥ kaṭinimā
kim iyam amṛta-vartiḥ kiṃ nu lāvaṇya-sindhuḥ
kim atha nalina-lakṣmīḥ kiṃ nu śṛṅgāra-vallī
mukhābjaṃ cet pītaṃ tad alam iha pīyūṣa-kathayā
bhrāntyā bimba-phalasya cājani dadhad vāmādharo vedhasā
bhrāntir viśva-sṛjo 'pi yatra kiyatī tatrāsmad-āder matiḥ
yan-nāmāpi sukhākaroti kalayaty urvīm api dyām iva
prāptir yasya yad-aṅga-saṅga-vidhinā kiṃ yan na nihnūyate
antaḥ kiṃ ca sudhā-sapatnam aniśaṃ jāgarti yad-rāgiṇāṃ
visrambhāspadam adbhutaṃ kim api tat-kānteti tattvāntaram
śikhariṇi kva nu nāma kiyac ciraṃ
yātā locana-gocaraṃ yadi vidher eṇekṣaṇā sundarī
nāpy āmīlita-locanasya racanād rūpaṃ bhaved īdṛśaṃ
tasmāt sarvam akartṛkaṃ jagad idaṃ śreyo mataṃ saugatam
saṃkocād atiduḥsthitasya na vidhes tac chilpam unmīlitam
gotre sākṣād ajani bhagavān eṣa yat padmayoniḥ
ekāgrāṃ yad dadhati bhagavaty uṣṇa-bhānau ca bhaktiṃ
tat prāpus te sutanu vadanaupamyam ambhoruhāṇi
koṣaḥ sphītataraḥ sthitāni paritaḥ patrāṇi durgaṃ jalaṃ
maitraṃ maṇḍalam ujjvalaṃ ciram adho-nītās tathā kaṇṭakāḥ
ity ākṛṣṭa-śilīmukhena racanāṃ kṛtvā tad atyadbhutaṃ
yat-padmena jigīṣuṇāpi na jitaṃ mugdhe tvadīyaṃ mukham
jyotsnādi kāraṇam abhūn madanaś ca vedhāḥ
rambhoru kṣipa locanārdham abhito bāṇān vṛthā manmathaḥ
saṃdndhattāṃ dhanur ujjhatu kṣaṇam ito bhrū-vallim ullāsaya
mugdhe vācam udīrayāstu jagato vīṇāsu bherī-bhramaḥ
durvārā madhupāḥ kiyanti taruṇi sthānāni rakṣiṣyasi
ratnāny apy avalokitāni bahuśo yuktāni muktā-phalaiḥ
yat tu projjhita-lāñchane hima-rucāv unnidram indīvaraṃ
saṃsaktaṃ ca mitho rathāṅga-mithunaṃ tat kutra dṛṣṭaṃ punaḥ
anyonyopamitaṃ yugaṃ nirupamaṃ te 'yugmam aṅgeṣu yat
so 'yaṃ sikthakam āsya-kānti-madhunas tanvaṅgi candras tava
abhyāsasya kim asty agocaram iti pratyāśayā mohitaḥ
lāvaṇya-draviṇa-vyayo na gaṇitaḥ kleśo mahān svīkṛtaḥ
svacchandaṃ vasato janasya hṛdaye cintā-jvaro nirmitaḥ
ko 'rthaś cetasi vedhasā vinihitas tanvyās tanuṃ tanvatā
asyāḥ sarga-vidhau prajāpatir abhūc candro nu kānti-pradaḥ
śṛṅgāraika-rasaḥ svayaṃ tu madano māsaḥ sa puṣpākaraḥ
nirmātuṃ prabhaven manoharam idaṃ rūpaṃ purāṇo muniḥ
tad-vaktraṃ yadi mudritā śaśikathā hā hema sā ced dyutis
tac cakṣur yadi hāritaṃ kuvalayais tac cet smitaṃ kā sudhā
dhik kandarpa-dhanur-bhruvau ca yadi te kiṃ vā bahu brūmahe
rājaśekharasya | (Brbā.rā. 2.17, Sksa.ka.ā. 4.72, Vsbvi.śā.bha. 1.14, Sdsā.da. under 10.113, Skmsa.u.ka. 966, Spdśā.pa. 3373)
lakṣmīṃ vakṣasi kaustubha-stavakini premṇā karoty acyuto
dehārdhe vahati tripiḍapa-gurur gaurīṃ svayaṃ śaṅkaraḥ
śaṅke paṅkaja-saṃbhavas tu bhagavān adyāpi bālyāvadhiḥ
sarvāṅga-praṇayāṃ priyāṃ kalayituṃ dīrghaṃ tapas tapyate
vyāvṛtta-stanam aṅga-cumbi-cibukaṃ sthitvā tayā māṃ prati
kṣepā eva tavāharanti hṛdayaṃ kiṃ saṃbhrameṇāmunā
tarat-tāraṃ tāvat prathamam atha citrārpitam iva
tataḥ kiṃcit phullaṃ tad anu ghana-bāṣpāmbu-laharī
parikṣāmaṃ cakṣuḥ patatu mayi tasyā mṛga-dṛśaḥ
sākūtaṃ ca sakautukaṃ ca suciraṃ nyastāḥ kilāsmān prati
sodaryāḥ suhṛdaḥ smarasya sudhayā digdhāḥ kaṭākṣa-cchaṭāḥ
dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭim adho dadāti kurute nālāpam ābhāṣitā
śayyāyāṃ parivṛtya tiṣṭhati balād āliṅgitā vepate
jātā vāmatayaiva me 'dya sutarāṃ prītyai navoḍhā priyā
śrī-harṣa-devasya | (Nn nāgānanda 3.4, Svsu.ā. 2072, Skmsa.u.ka. 516, 1126, Spdśā.pa. 3672, Smvsū.mu. 77.2)
hāsya-śrī-lava-lāñchitā ca yad asāv asyāḥ kapola-sthalī
lolal-locana-gocaraṃ vrajati sa svargād apūrvo vidhiḥ
kamalam iti gṛhītaṃ haṃsam āśu tyajantyāḥ
cakitam iha na dṛṣṭaṃ mūḍha tad vañcito 'si
manye hīnaṃ stana-jaghanayor ekam āśaṅkya dhātrā
mad-dṛṣṭis tṛṣiteva saṃprati śanair āruhya tuṅgau stanau
tad api na hariṇākṣīṃ vismaraty antarātmā
sā bālā vayam apragalbha-manasaḥ sā strī vayaṃ kātarāḥ
sā pīnonnatimat payodhara-yugaṃ dhatte sakhedā vayam
sākrāntā jaghana-sthalena guruṇā gantuṃ na śaktā vayaṃ
doṣair anya-janāśritair apaṭavo jātāḥ sma ity adbhutam
gāḍhaṃ nikhāta iva me hṛdaye kaṭākṣaḥ
na saṃtāpa-cchedo hima-sarasi vā candramasi vā
mano niṣṭhā-śūnyaṃ bhramati ca kim apy ālikhati ca
punar-janmany asmin anubhava-pathaṃ yo na gatavān
vikāraḥ ko 'py antar jaḍayati ca tāpaṃ ca kurute
prānta-bhrāmyad-asañjita-bhru yad idaṃ kiṃ tan na jānīmahe
amṛta-siktam ivāṅgam idaṃ yadi bhavati tanvi tavādbhuta-vīkṣitaiḥ /
adharam indukarād api śubhrayanty aruṇayanty aruṇād api kiṃ dṛśam //
sā netrāñjanatāṃ punar vrajati me vācām ayaṃ vibhramaḥ
etāvad bahu yad babhūva katham apy ekatra manvantare
nirmāṇaṃ vapuṣo mamoru-tapasas tasyāś ca vāma-bhruvaḥ
ādau vismaya-nistaraṅgam anu ca preṅkholitaṃ sādhvasaiḥ
cakṣur bhūri kathaṃ kathaṃcid agamat preyāṃsam eṇīdṛśaḥ
gacchati puraḥ śarīraṃ dhāvati paścād asaṃsthitaṃ cetaḥ /
asyās tuṅgam iva stana-dvayam idaṃ nimneva nābhiḥ sthitā
dṛśyante viṣamonnatāś ca valayo bhittau samāyām api
aṅge ca pratibhāti mārdavam idaṃ snigdha-svabhāvaś ciraṃ
premṇā man-mukha-candram īkṣita eva smereva vaktīti ca
svacchandaṃ sva-gṛhāṅgaṇaṃ bhramati sā mad-darśanād līyate
dhanyān paśyati locanena sakalenārdhena māṃ vīkṣate
anyān mantrayate punar mayi gate maunaṃ samālambate
nīto dūram ahaṃ tayā dayitayā sāmānya-lokād api
alasayati gātram adhikaṃ bhramayati cetas tanoti saṃtāpam /
mohaṃ ca muhuḥ kurute viṣama-viṣaṃ vīkṣitaṃ tasyāḥ //
yaḥ strī-mukhaṃ ca śaśinaṃ ca samīkaroti
sā yair dṛṣṭā na vā dṛṣṭā
pronmīlat-kuca-kuḍmaleti hṛdaya tvāṃ dhig vṛthā śrāmyasi
māyeyaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇikāsv api payaḥ pātuṃ samīhā tava
tyaktavye pathi mā kṛthāḥ punar api prema-pramādāspadam
kathaya sukṛtī ko 'yaṃ mugdhe tvayādya vilokyate
yadi sarojam idaṃ kva niśi prabhā
yadi niśāpatir ahni kuto nu saḥ
na vivṛto madano na ca saṃvṛtaḥ
kathaya sukṛtī ko 'sau mugdhe tvayādya vilokyate
prītyā karṣati cumbati tvarayati śliṣyaty asūyaty api
vyāvṛttyā śithilīkaroti vasanaṃ jāgraty api vrīḍayā
dattvāṅgaṃ svapiti priyasya rataye vyājena nidrāṃ gatā
tanvy-aṅgyā viphalaṃ viceṣṭitam aho bhāvānabhijñe jane
tanvī sthitā katicid eva padāni gatvā
dūrād eva kṛto 'ñjalir na sa punaḥ pānīya-pānocito
rūpālokana-vismitena calitaṃ mūrdhnā na śāntyā tṛṣaḥ
romāñco 'pi nirantaraṃ prakaṭitaḥ prītyā na śaityād apāṃ
akṣuṇṇo vidhir adhvagena ghaṭito vīkṣya prapā-pālikām
vayaṃ tattvānveṣān madhukara hatās tvaṃ khalu kṛtī
snigdhaṃ vīkṣitam anyato 'pi nayane yat preṣayantyā tayā
yātaṃ yac ca nirambayor gurutayā mandaṃ viṣādād iva
mā gā ity uparuddhayā yad api tat sāsūyam uktā sakhī
sarvaṃ tat kila mat-parāyaṇam aho kāmaḥ svatāṃ paśyati
manāg vapur apāvṛṇu spṛśatu kāñcanaṃ kālikāṃ
udañcaya nijānanaṃ bhavatu ca dvi-candraṃ nabhaḥ
bhāṣante ca yad uktibhiḥ stavakitaṃ vaidagdhya-mudrātmabhisḥ
tad devasya rasāyanaṃ rasanidher manye manojanmanaḥ
mano harati subhruvaḥ kim api kanduka-krīḍitam
kambor viḍambana-karaś ca sa eva kaṇṭhaḥ
kva vā pārīmeyo bata bakula-dāmnāṃ parimalaḥ
kathaṃ svapnaḥ sākṣāt kuvalaya-dṛśaṃ kalpayatu tām

[NOTE: kva peyaṃ jyotsnāmbho vadata visavallī-saraṇibhir]
rājaśekharasya | (Sksa.ka.ā. 2.60, Skmsa.u.ka. 949)
rasavad amṛtaṃ kaḥ saṃdeho madhūny api nānyathā
sakṛd api punar madhyasthaḥ san rasāntara-vijjano
vadatu yad ihānyat svādu syāt priyāradana-cchadāt
hasitam amṛtaṃ hanta svādoḥ paraṃ rasa-saṃpadaḥ
viṣam upahitaṃ cintāvyājān manasy api kāmināṃ
kim uta sakale jāte vāhni-priya tvam ihaiṣyasi
haṃsānām udayo 'stu pūrṇa-śaśinaḥ stād bhadram indīvare
strī kācid ity abhihite hi mano madīyaṃ
tvad-dhyānaiḥ satataṃ kuraṅgaka-dṛśaḥ kintv etad āste navam
śyāmībhūta-kapolam indur adhunā yat tan mukhaṃ spardhate
sodvegā mṛga-lāñchane mukham api svaṃ nekṣate darpaṇe
trastā kokila-kūjitād api giraṃ nonmudrayaty ātmanaḥ
mugdhā sā subhage tvayi pratimuhuḥ premādhikaṃ puṣyati
diśaṃ cakraṃ candre sukṛtamaya tasyā mṛga-dṛśaḥ
dṛśor bāṣpaḥ pāṇau vadanam asavaḥ kaṇṭha-kuhare
hṛdi tvaṃ hrīḥ pṛṣṭhe vacasi ca guṇā eva bhavataḥ
vaktrendor na haranti bāṣpa-payasāṃ dhārā-manojñāṃ śriyaṃ
niḥśvāsā na kadarthayanti madhurāṃ bimbādharasya dyutim
chāyā kāpi kapolayor anudinaṃ tasyāḥ paraṃ śuṣyati
tāpo 'mbhaḥ prasṛtiṃ pacaḥ pracayavān bāṣpaḥ praṇālocitaḥ
kiṃ cānyat kathayāmi rātrim akhilāṃ tvad-vartma-vātāyane
candraṃ candana-kardamena likhitaṃ sā mārṣṭi daṣṭādharā
vandyaṃ nindati yac ca manmatham asau bhaṅktvāgrahas tāṅgulīḥ
kāmaḥ puṣpa-śaraḥ kileti sumano-vargaṃ lunīte ca yat
tat kāṃ sā subhaga tvayā varat-tanur bātūlatāṃ lambhitā
no śakyā gadituṃ smarānala-daśā yāsyās tvayi prasthite
yad liptaṃ kuca-candanena sutanor adyāpi candra-cchalāc
prakaṭayati kṣaṇa-bhaṅgaṃ paśyati sarvaṃ jagad gataṃ śūnyam /
ācarati smṛti-bāhyaṃ jātā sā bauddha-buddhir iva //
dhūmeneva hate dṛśau visṛjato bāṣpaṃ pravāha-kṣama
saṃtāpārtivinodanāya katham apy ālikhya sakhyā bhavān
mūrdhnā ca praṇataḥ sakhīṣu madana-vyājena cāpahnutaḥ
subhaga sukṛta-prāpyo yadyapy asi tvam asāv api
tad alam adhunā nirbandhena prasīda parasparaṃ
tad-gātrāṇāṃ kim iva hi bahu brūmahe durbalatvaṃ
yeṣām agre pratipad uditā candralekhāpy atanvī
asyās tāpam ahaṃ mukunda kathayāmy eṇīdṛśas te kathaṃ
padminyāḥ sarasaṃ dalaṃ vinihitaṃ yasyāḥ satāpe hṛdi
ādau śuṣyati saṃkucaty anu tataś cūrṇatvam āpadyate
paścān murmuratāṃ dadhad dahati ca śvāsāvadhūtaḥ śikhī
kasyacit | (Smvsū.mu. 44.25 utpalarāja; Skmsa.u.ka. 626 kasyacit; Pvpadyā. 356 śāntikarasya)
kṣata-kṣāro hāraḥ sa khalu puṭa-pāko malayajaḥ
aye kiṃcid vakre tvayi subhaga sarve katham amī
tvāṃ cintā-parikalpitaṃ subhaga sā saṃbhāvya romāñcitā
gāḍhāv adhaḥ-kṛta-bali-tritayau susaṅga tuṅgau stanāv iti tayos talam ārtam āgāt /
tasyāḥ sphuṭaṃ hṛdayam ity api na smareṣūnta rakṣataḥ praviśato vimukho 'tha vā kva //
mṛga-śiśu-dṛśas tasyās tāpaṃ kathaṃ kathayāmi te
dahana-patitā dṛṣṭā mūrtir mayā na hi vaidhavī
iti tu niyataṃ nārī-rūpaḥ sa loka-dṛśāṃ priyas
iyam iva karajaḥ kṣīṇas tvam iva kaṭhorāṇi parvāṇi //
kāntenāśu mudhā vilokitam atho tanvyā mudhā lajjitaṃ
bhūyo 'nena mudhāvakṛṣṭam atha tat tanvyā mudhā saṃvṛtam
kiṃ kiṃ na hanta hṛdayaṅgamam aṅganāyāḥ
kṣaṇaṃ śroṇau pāṇī kṣaṇam api kucāgre priya-dṛśoḥ
kṣaṇaṃ vinyasyantyār jagad api na mūlyaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ
mugdhā vidhāya laḍitāni ca tāni tāni
yad vrīḍā-bhara-bhugnam āsya-kamalaṃ yac cakṣur atyullasat-d
tenaiveha mano haraty adharita-prauḍhā navoḍhā na kim
sa svargād aparo vidhiḥ sa ca sudhāsekaḥ kṣaṇaṃ netrayos
tat-sāmrājyam agañjitaṃ tad aparaṃ premṇaḥ pratiṣṭhāspadam
samāliṅgaty aṅgair apasarati yat preyasi vapuḥ
pidhātuṃ yad dṛśyaṃ ghaṭayati ghanāliṅganam api
tapobhir bhūyobhiḥ kim u na kamanīyaṃ sukṛtinām
ātte vāsasi roddhum akṣamatayā doḥ-kandalībhyāṃ stanau
śroṇīṃ tasya kare 'dhirohati punar vrīḍāmbudhau mām atho
majjantīm udatārayan manasijo devaḥ sa mūrcchā-guruḥ
samārūḍhaṃ kiṃcit pulakam idam āhuḥ kila janāḥ
ākṛṣṭe jaghanāṃśuke kṛtam adhaḥ saṃsaktam ūru-dvayam
kānte talpam upāgate vigalitā nīvī svayaṃ tat-kṣaṇāt
etāvat sakhi vedmi kevalam ahaṃ tasyāṅga-saṅge punaḥ
ko 'sau kāsmi rataṃ tu kiṃ katham iti svalpāpi me na smṛtiḥ
vikaṭa-nitambāyāḥ | (āmaruśataka 97, Sksa.ka.ā. 5.44, Drda.rū.. under 2.18, Svsu.ā. 2147, Spdśā.pa. 3747, Smvsū.mu. 86.17, Skmsa.u.ka. 1171)
sakhi svairaṃ svairaṃ suratam akarod vrīḍita-vapuḥ
narma-smitaṃ ca vadanaṃ ca rasaṃ ca tasya
nīvīṃ prati praṇihite tu kare priyeṇa
sakhyaḥ śapāmi yadi kiṃcid api smarāmi
api taruṇayoḥ kiṃ syāt tasyāṃ divi spṛhayālutāḥ
tasya smera-śuceḥ kramasya ca girāṃ mugdhākṣarāṇāṃ hriyā
bhāvānām api tādṛśāṃ mṛgadṛśo hāvānugānām aho
nādhanyaḥ kurute prarūḍha-pulakair ātithyam aṅgair janaḥ
samākṛṣṭaṃ vāsaḥ katham api haṭhāt paśyati tadā
tayā dṛṣṭiṃ dattvā mahati maṇi-dīpe nipuṇayā
tathā śītaṃ sphītaṃ himavati niśīthe glapayati
tad-ārabdhaṃ tanvyā na tu yad abalāyāḥ samucitam
sapadi maraṇam eva sā tu yāyād
mugdhe tavāsmi dayitā dayito bhava tvam
ity uktayā na hi na hīti śiro 'vadhūya
svasmāt karān mama kare valayaṃ kṣipantyā
sthagayati karaiḥ patyur netre vihasya samākulā
surata-viratau ramyaṃ tanvī punaḥ punar īkṣitum
rāgāc cumbitam apy upetya vadanaṃ pītaṃ ca vaktrāmṛtam
niḥśeṣeṇa samāpito rati-vidhir vācā tu nāṅgīkṛtaḥ
tanvaṅgyā rabhasārpitaṃ sarabhasaṃ vaktraṃ muhuḥ pīyate
tac chlāghyaṃ surataṃ ca tat tad amṛtaṃ tad vastu tad brahma tac
ceto-hāri tad eva tat kim api tat tattvāntaraṃ sarvathā
na bata vidhṛtaḥ kāñcī-sthāne karaḥ ślatha-vāsasi
kuca-kalaśayor ūḍhaḥ kampas tayā mama saṃnidhau
kiṃ tasya tat sakhi nirūpitam aṅgam aṅgam
sa kasmān me preyān sakhi katham ahaṃ tasya dayitā
yato māṃ spṛṣṭvaiva snapayati karaṃ sveda-payasā
kim api kim api mandaṃ mandam āsatti-yogād
prāgalbhyāt yad anuṣṭhitaṃ mṛgadṛśā śakyaṃ na tad yoṣitām
nirvyūḍhaṃ na yadā tayā tad akhilaṃ khinnais tatas tārakaiḥ
sa-vrīḍaiś ca vilokitair mayi punar nyastaḥ samasto vyayaḥ
nava-taruṇayoḥ ko jānīte kim adya phaliṣyati
nidrārtaṃ kila locanaṃ mṛgadṛśā viśleṣayantyā kathāṃ
ujjṛmbhaḥ kila vallabho 'pi virate vastuny api prastute
ghūrṇantī kila sāpi hūṅkṛtavatī śūnyaṃ sakhī dakṣiṇā
tataḥ kiṃcit paścād valati ca mukhendau mṛgadṛśaḥ
nirīkṣyā re māyī kim idam iti pūrvā vijayate
āśleṣaḥ prathamaṃ krameṇa vijite kṛtye dhanasyārpaṇaṃ
keli-dyūta-vidhau paṇaṃ priyatame kāntāṃ punaḥ pṛcchati
bhogaḥ sa yadyapi jaye ca parājaye ca
yūnor manas tad api vāñchati jetum eva
dayitam abhitas tām utkaṇṭhāṃ vivavrur anantaraṃ
jvalati rasanā-rocir dīpe tad āpa nirarthatām
yuvatiṣu kim apy avyākhyeyaṃ smarasya vijṛmbhitam
vilayanam atha prāptā rāgānaloṣmabhir ity aho
kvacic cūrṇodgāraiḥ kvacid api ca sālaktaka-padaḥ
kṛtārthatve 'nyonyaṃ tad anu viditau kiṃ na kurutām
kiṃ vāsasā stanāntaṃ ruṇatsi hima-ruci-kṛte vacmi //
yad rātrau rahasi vyapeta-vinayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ rasāt kāminor
tat sānanda-milad-dṛśoḥ katham api smṛtvā gurūṇāṃ puroaḥ
tat prātar guru-sannidhau nigadatas tasyopahāraṃ vadhūḥ
prayacchāhāraṃ me yadi tava raho-vṛttam akhilaṃ
mayā vācyaṃ noccair iti gṛha-śuke jalpati śanaiḥ
haṃho kānta raho-gatena bhavatā yat-pūrvam āveditaṃ
nirbhinnā tanur āvayor iti mayā taj-jātam adya sphuṭam
so 'tyarthaṃ katham anyathā dahati mām eṣa tvad-oṣṭha-vraṇaḥ
krīḍā-śārikayā nilīya nibhṛtaṃ trotuṃ trapārtāṃ vadhūṃ
talpe campaka-kalpite sakhi gṛhodyāne 'dya suptāsi kiṃ
āḥ kiṃ chadma-vidagdha-mānini mayi brūṣe puro-bhāgini
krūrair ullikhitāsmi tatra kusumāny uccinvatī kaṇṭakaiḥ
likhantīnāṃ patrāṅkuram aniśam asyās tu kucayoś
valatu taralā dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭiḥ khalā sakhi mekhalā
skhalatu kucayor utkampān me vidīryantu kañcukam
tad api na mayā saṃbhāṣyo 'sau punar dayitaḥ śaṭhaḥ
sphuṭati hṛdayaṃ maunenāntar na me yadi tat-kṣaṇāt
tad evājihmākṣaṃ mukham aviṣadās tā gira imāḥ
sa evāṅgākṣepo mayi sarasam āśliṣyati tanum
yad uktaṃ pratyuktaṃ tad apaṭu śiraḥ kampana-paraṃ
priyā mānenāho punar api kṛtā me nava-vadhūḥ
yadi vinihitā śūnyā dṛṣṭiḥ kim u sthira-kautukā
yadi viracito maune yatnaḥ kim u sphurito 'dharaḥ
yadi niyamitaṃ dhyāne cakṣuḥ kathaṃ pulakodgamaḥ
kṛtam abhinayair dṛṣṭo mānaḥ prasīda kim ucyatām
ālāpo 'pi na miśritaḥ parijanaṃ vyāpārayanty āntike
tasyaiva (Amaru 17, Skmsa.u.ka. 692, Svsu.ā. 1583, Spdśā.pa. 3534, Smvsū.mu. 55.6, Drda.rū. 2.19, Rask 2.67g)
tad-vaktrābhimukhaṃ mukhaṃ vinamitaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ kṛtā cānyatas
hastābhyām api vāritaḥ sapulakaḥ svedodgamo gaṇḍayoḥ
sakhyaḥ kiṃ karavāṇi yānti sahasā yat kañcuke sandhayaḥ
dūrād utsukam āgate vivalitaṃ saṃbhāṣiṇi sphāritaṃ
cakṣur jātam aho prapañca-caturaṃ jātāgasi preyasi
vaco-vṛtir mā bhūd valatu ca na vā vaktram abhito
na nāma syād bāṣpāgamam aviṣadaṃ locana-yugam
priyā prauḍha-krodhāpy apahṛtavatī yan na caraṇau
kiṃ pādānte luṭhasi vimanāḥ svāmino hi svatantrāḥ
kañcit kālaṃ kvacid abhiratas tatra kas te 'parādhaḥ
āgaskāriṇy aham iha yayā jīvitaṃ tad-viyoge
bhartṛ-prāṇāḥ striya iti nanu tvaṃ mamaivānuneyaḥ
vākkūṭasya (SKM sa.u.ka. 2.47.1706, bhāvadevyāḥ; Skm padyā. 381 383 kasyacit; Smvsū.mu. 57.14)
yad gamyaṃ guru-gauravasya suhṛdo yasmin labhante 'ntaraṃ
yad-dākṣiṇya-rasād bhiyā ca sahasā narmopacārāṇy api
yal lajjā niruṇaddhi yatra śapathair utpādyate pratyayaḥ
tat kiṃ prema sa ucyate paricayas tatrāpi kopena kim
bhrū-bhedo racitaḥ ciraṃ nayanayor abhyastam āmīlanaṃ
roddhuṃ śikṣitam ādareṇa hasitaṃ maune 'bhiyogaḥ kṛtaḥ
dhairyaṃ kartum api sthirīkṛtam idaṃ cetaḥ kathaṃcin mayā
baddho māna-parigrahe parikaraḥ siddhis tu daiva-sthitā
tathābhūd asmākaṃ prathamam avibhinnā tanur iyaṃ
tato nu tvaṃ preyān aham api hatāśā priyatamā
idānīṃ nāthas tvaṃ vayam api kalatraṃ kim aparaṃ
kopo yatra bhrū-kuṭi-racanā nigraho yatra maunaṃ
tasya premṇas tad idam adhunā vaiṣamaṃ paśya jātaṃ
tvaṃ pādānte luṭhasi nahi me manyu-mokṣaḥ khalāyāḥ
tasyaiva (Amaru 34; Drda.rū.. 2.19, Svsu.ā. 1630, Spdśā.pa. 3562, Smvsū.mu. 84.7, Skmsa.u.ka. 709)
viṣeṇāghūrṇantī kim api na sakhīyaṃ gaṇayati
mugdhe cumbatu nāma cañcalatayā bhṛṅgaḥ kvacit kandalīm
tan muñca mānini ruṣaṃ kriyatāṃ prasādaḥ
bāle nātha vimuñca mānini ruṣaṃ roṣān mayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ
khedo 'smāsu na me 'parādhyati bhavān sarve 'parādhā mayi
tat kiṃ rodiṣi gadgadena vacasā kasyāgrato rudyate
nanv etan mama kā tavāsmi dayitā nāsmīty ato rudyate
amaroḥ (Amaru 53; Drda.rū. 2.17; Svsu.ā. 1614, Spdśā.pa. 3554, Smvsū.mu. 57.1, Srk sa.u.ka. 691)
gata-prāyā rātriḥ kṛśa-tanu śaśī śīryata iva
praṇāmānto mānas tyajasi na tathāpi krudham aho
kuca-pratyāsattyā hṛdayam api te caṇḍi kaṭhinam
na ruddho nirgacchann ayam iti vilakṣaḥ priyatamaḥ
sakhī līko 'py āsīl likhita iva citreṇa kim idam
bhavatu viditaṃ chadmālāpair alaṃ priya gamyatāṃ
tanur api na te doṣo 'smākaṃ vidhis tu parāṅmukhaḥ
tava yathā tathābhūtaṃ prema prapannam imāṃ daśāṃ
prakṛti-capale kā naḥ pīḍā gate hata-jīvite
dharmakīrteḥ (Amaru 27; Svsu.ā. 1617, Smvsū.mu. 57.6, Skmsa.u.ka. 708 bimbokasya, Pvpadyā. 223)
asad-vṛtto nāyaṃ na ca sakhi guṇair eṣa rahitaḥ
tvayākāṇḍe mānaḥ kim iti sarale preyasi kṛtaḥ
mā rodīḥ sakhi naśyad-andhatamasaṃ paśyāmbaraṃ jyotsnayā
śītāṃśuḥ sudhayā vilimpati sakhā rājño manojanmanaḥ
kaḥ kopāvasaraḥ prasīda rahasi svedāmbhasaṃ bindavo
mā bhaṅgīḥ parikheda-sākṣibhir iva śvāsair mukhendoḥ śriyam
mugdhe dagdha-giraḥ skhalanti śataśaḥ kiM kupyasi preyasi
prāṇās tanvi mamāsi nocitam idaṃ tad vyartham uttāmyasi
yad etan netrāmbhaḥ patad api samāsādya taruṇī
pakṣmāntaḥ skhalitāḥ kapola-phalake lolaṃ luṭhantaḥ kṣaṇaṃ
muhuḥ kaṇṭhe lagnas taralayati bāṣpaḥ stana-taṭaṃ
priyo manyur jātas tava niranurodhe na tu vayam
dhik dhik tvām ayi kena durmukhi kṛtaṃ kiṃ kiṃ na kāya-vrataṃ
dvitrāṇy atra dināni ko na kupitaḥ ko nābhavan mānuṣaḥ
smaḥ kecin na vayaṃ yad ekam aparasyāpy uktam ākarṇyatāṃ
sphuṭatu hṛdayaṃ kāmaṃ kāmaṃ karatu tanuṃ tanuṃ
na sakhi caṭula-premṇā kāryaṃ punar dayitena me
iti sarabhasaṃ mānāṭopād udīrya vacas tayā
anyonyasya hṛdi sthite 'py anunaye saṃrakṣator gauravam
aho divyaṃ cakṣur vahasi tava sāpi praṇayinī
bhavān ekas tasyāḥ pratikṛti-mayīr eva ramaṇīḥ
priye maunaṃ muñca śrutir amṛta-dhārāṃ pibatu me
kopas tvayā yadi kṛto mayi paṅkajākṣi
so 'stu priyas tava kim asti vidheyam anyat
sakhi kalitaḥ skhalito 'yaṃ heyo naiva praṇāma-mātreṇa /
jāte keli-kalau kṛte kamitari vyarthānunītau cirānd
māne mlāyati manmathe vikasati kṣīṇe kṣapānehasi
māna-mlānir abhūn na yena ca na cāpy āsīd rahaḥk-haṇḍanam
kathaṃcin naidāghe divasa iva kope vigalite
prasattau prāptāyāṃ tad-anu ca niśāyām iva śanaiḥ
no gantuṃ na sakhī-jano 'sti caturo yo māṃ balān neṣyati
mānī so 'pi jano na lāghava-bhayād abhyeti mātaḥ svayaṃ
kālo yāti calaṃ ca jīvitam iti kṣuṇṇaṃ manaś cintayā
yāvan no sakhi gocaraṃ nayanayor āyāti tāvad drutaṃ
gatvā brūhi yathādya te dayitayā mānaḥ samālambitaḥ
dṛṣṭe dhūrta-viceṣṭite tu dayite tasmin avaśyaṃ mama
dṛṣṭā muṣṭibhir āhatā hṛdi nakhair ācoṭitā pārśvayor
ākṛṣṭā kabarīṣu gāḍham adhare śītkurvatī khaṇḍitā
tvat-kṛtyaṃ tvad-agocare 'pi hi kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ mayaivādhunā
mām ājñāpaya kiṃ karomi sarale bhūyaḥ sapatnyās tava
sutanu jahihi kopaṃ paśya pādānataṃ māṃ
na khalu tava kadācit kopa evaṃ vidho 'bhūt
nayana-jalam analpaṃ muktam uktaṃ na kiṃcit
cetasy aṅkuritaṃ visāriṇi dṛśor dvandve dvipatrāyitaṃ
prāyaṃ pallavitaṃ vacasy upacitaṃ prauḍhaṃ kapola-sthale
ciraṃ loṭhaty eṣa grahavati na mānād viramasi
śṛṇu tvaṃ yad brūmaḥ priya-sakhi na māne kuru matim
kṛtvāgaḥ sa ca nāgato 'pi kim api vyaktaṃ mano manyate
tat kvāse kam upaimi jaṅgama-vane ko mām ihāśvāsayet
ity uktvāśru-galan-mukhī viṭa-sakhī dhvastā viśantī gṛhaṃ
dhanyenādhim upāśruṇor asi kṛtātyantaṃ priyā roditā
na jānīmaḥ kiṃ nu kva nu kiyad anena vyavasitaṃ
sakhi pratyeṣi tvaṃ prakṛti-sarale paśyasi na kim
na mando vaktrenduḥ śrayati na lalāṭaṃ kuṭilatā
na netrābjaṃ rajyaty anuṣajati na bhrūr api bhidām
tat tad vadaty api yathāvasaraṃ hasaty apy
ūrvor gāḍha-nipīḍanena jaghane pāṇiṃ ca ruddhvānayā
patyuḥ prema na khaṇḍitaṃ nipuṇayā māno 'pi naivojjhitaḥ
dṛṣṭir yatra ca dīrgha-jāgara-guruḥ kope madīye tava
tāny anyāni dināni muñca caraṇau saivāham anyo bhavān
parīrambhārambhaḥ spṛśati param icchāṃ na tu bhujau
bhajante vijñānaṃ na tu giram anūrodha-vidhayaḥ
manaḥ pratyāvṛttaṃ kamitari kathaṃcin na tu vapuḥ
tāvat kiṃ kathayāmi keli-paṭunā nirgatya kuñjodarād
sakhi sa subhago manda-sneho mayīti na me vyathā
vidhi-pariṇataṃ yasmāt sarvo janaḥ sukham aśnute
mama tu manasaḥ saṃtāpo 'yaṃ priye vimukho 'pi yat
katham api hata-vrīḍaṃ ceto na yāti virāgitām
bhrū-bhaṅge racite 'pi dṛṣṭir adhikaṃ sotkaṇṭham udvīkṣate
ruddhāyām api vāci sasmitam idaṃ dagdhānanaṃ jāyate
dṛṣṭe nirvahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati kathaṃ mānasya tasmin jane
preyān so 'yam apākṛtaḥ sa-śapathaṃ pādānataḥ kāntayā
dvitrāṇy eva padāni vāsa-bhavanād yāvan na yāty ātmanā
dhāvitv eva kṛta-praṇāmakam aho premṇo vicitrā gatiḥ
nivṛtte sad-bhāve jana iva jane gacchati puraḥ
tad utprekṣyotprekṣya priyasakhi gatāṃs tāṃś ca divasān
na jāne ko hetur dalati śatadhā yan na hṛdayam
sutanu nitambas tava pṛthur akṣṇor api niyatam arjuno mahimā /
madhyaḥ savalir idāniṃ māndhātā kuca-taṭaḥ kriyatām //
nyag-bhūtaṃ bahir āsthitaṃ pulakavat saṃsparśam ātanvati
kiṃ cāsyā malaya-druma-drava-bharair limpāmi yāvat karaṃ
buddhenoddhata-buddhinā smara tataḥ kāntena pānthena me
tvyaktvā tān bata haṃsi mām api kṛśāṃ bālām anāthāṃ striyaṃ
dhik tvā dhik tava pauruṣaṃ dhig udayaṃ dhik kārmukaṃ dhik śarān
karṇe yan na kṛtaṃ sakhījana-vaco yan nādṛtā bandhu-vāk
nāsāgre nayanaṃ yad etad aparaṃ yac caikatānaṃ manaḥ
maunaṃ cedam idaṃ ca śūnyam akhilaṃ yad viśvam ābhāti te
tad brūyāḥ sakhi yoginī kim asi bhoḥ kiṃ vā viyoginy api
rājaśekharasya (SKM sa.u.ka. 597, Pvpadyā. 238, Srk 703 Rajasekhara, UN 13.75)
vatse naite payodāḥ surapati-kariṇo no bakāḥ karṇa-śaṅkāḥ
saudāminyo 'pi naitāḥ kanaka-mayam idaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ kumbha-pīṭhe
naitat toyaṃ nabhastaḥ patati mada-jalaṃ śvāsa-vātāvadhūtaṃ
tat kiṃ mugdhe vṛthā tvaṃ malinayasi mukhaṃ prāvṛḍ ity aśru-pātaiḥ
dārūṇīva na me viraṃsyati dahann aṅgāny anaṅgānalaḥ
sakhi priyas te kṣaṇikaḥ kim anyan
sa cāyaṃ nirghoṣaḥ sa ca rava-vaśo bheka-nicayaḥ
pramāthī nirdhūmaṃ jvalati vidhutaḥ pāvaka iva
hinasti pratyaṅgaṃ jvara iva garīyān ita ito
na māṃ trātuṃ tātaḥ prabhavati na cāmbā na bhavatī
etasyāḥ viraha-jvaraḥ karatala-sparśaiḥ parīkṣya na yaḥ
snigdhenāpi janena dāha-bhayataḥ prasthaṃ pacaḥ pāthasām
lāja-sphoṭam amī sphuṭanti maṇayo viśve 'pi hāra-srajām
yat tādī-dala-pāka-pāṇḍu vadanaṃ yan netrayor durdinaṃ
gaṇḍaḥ pāṇiniṣevaṇāc ca yad ayaṃ saṃkrānta-pañcāṅguliḥ
gaurī krudhyatu vartate yadi na te tat ko 'pi citte yuvā
dhig dhik tvāṃ saha-pāṃśu-khelana-sakhī-loke 'pi yan nihnavaḥ
rājaśekharasya | (Vid. 2.14, Srb 286.26; Smk 39.2; śb Sb 2.17, 4.555; Srkm 598)
yāvat kiṃcid udantam ātmakam itus tāvat sa evety atha
vrīḍā-vakrita-kaṇṭha-nālam abalā kaiḥ kair na bhinnā rasaiḥ
iha hi tava luṭhantaḥ ploṣa-pīḍāṃ bhajante
yad daurbalyaṃ vapuṣi mahatī sarvataś cāspṛhā yan
nāsālakṣyaṃ yad api nayanaṃ maunam ekāntato yat
ekādhīnaṃ kathayati manas tāvad eṣā daśā te
kosāv ekaḥ kathaya sumukhi brahma vā vallabho vā
iyaṃ naḥ kalyāṇī ramayati matiṃ kalpayati ca
nidre bhadram avasthitāsi kuśalaṃ saṃvedane kiṃ tava
kṣemaṃ te sakhi nirvṛte na tu samaṃ kāntena yūyaṃ gatāḥ
kiṃ cānyat priya-saṃgame 'dya calito gacchan vipad-vatsalo
madhye sadma samudgatā tad anu ca dvārāntarālaṃ gatā
niryātātha kathaṃcid aṅgaṇam api preyāṃs tu nālokitaḥ
haṃho vāyasa rājahaṃsa śuka he he sārike kathyatāṃ
kā vārteti mṛgīdṛśo vijayate bāṣpāntarāyaṃ vacaḥ
balavati sati yasmin sārdham āvartya hemnā
nirlajjā he jīvita na śrutaṃ kiṃ
bāṣpaṃ cakṣuṣi nāñjanaṃ kara-tale vaktraṃ na līlāmbujaṃ
gaṇḍe pāṇḍurimā na patra-makarī śvāsā mukhe na smitam
itthaṃ yasya viyoga-yoga-vidhuraṃ mugdhe tavedaṃ vapur
no jāne katamaḥ sa puṣpa-dhanuṣā nītaḥ prasāda-śriyam
aratir iyam upaiti māṃ na nidrā
gaṇayati tasya guṇān mano na doṣān
pravarasenasya | (Pvpadyā. 214; Spdśā.pa. 3427 bilhaṇasya, Skmsa.u.ka. 660, Srb su.ra.bhā. 284.17)
nāvasthā vapuṣo mameyam avadher uktasya nātikramo
praṣṭavyaḥ śivamāli kevalam asau kaccid bhavad-gocare
nāyātaṃ malayānilair mukulitaṃ kaccin na cūtair iti
citreṇālikhituṃ tam icchati yadi svedaḥ sapatnī-janaḥ
mugdheyaṃ kurute 'tha tad-guṇa-kathāṃ manyur girām argalaḥ
brūyās taṃ janam ādaraḥ khalu mahān prāṇeṣu kāryas tvayā
etāṃ mlānim upāgatāṃ srajam iva tyaktvā tanuṃ durvahām
eṣāhaṃ sukhinī bhavāmi na sahe tīvrāṃ viyoga-vyathām
kasyacit | (Amaru 76, Sbhsu.ā. 1056, Srb 359.86, Daś 2.27 ad, Ssm 483)
mā bhūd āgata ity amanda-valitodgrīvaṃ muhur vīkṣitam
netre bāṣpa-taraṅginī pariṇataḥ kaṇṭhe kalaḥ pañcamaḥ
viśeṣās te mugdhe dadhatu kṛtināṃ cetasi padam
kim iti kabarī yādṛk tādṛg dṛśau kim akajjale
ayam asamayaṃ kiṃ ca klāmyaty asaṃsmaraṇena te
vāraṃ vāram alīka eva hi bhavān kiṃ vyāhṛtair gamyatām
tanvaṅgyāḥ prakaṭīkarīti tanutām aṅge bhraman vāyasaḥ
vinyasyānanam āyatākṣi sukṛtī ko 'yaṃ tvayā smaryate
dahati viraheṣv aṅgān īrṣyāṃ karoti samāgame
harati hṛdayaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ karoty avaśāṃ tanum
kṣaṇam api sukhaṃ yasmin prāpte gate ca na labhyate
kim aparam ataś citraṃ yan me tathāpi sa vallabhaḥ
ko 'sau dhanyaḥ kathaya subhage kasya gaṅgā-sarayvos
tasyaitan me phalam upanataṃ nātha yat te viyogaḥ
kīryante kaṇaśaḥ kṛśāṅgi kim amī bāṣpāmbhasāṃ bindavaḥ
idānīṃ tīvrābhir dahana iva bhābhiḥ parigatoaḥ
mamāścaryaṃ sūryaḥ kim u sakhi rajanyām udayate
ayaṃ mugdhe candraḥ kim iti mayi tāpaṃ prakaṭayaty
anāthānāṃ bāle kim iha viparītaṃ na bhavati
mā muñcāgni-mucaḥ karān himakara prāṇāḥ kṣaṇaṃ sthīyatāṃ
nidre mudraya locane rajani he dīrghātidīrghā bhava
svacchando bhavatāṃ bhaviṣyati punaḥ kaṣṭo viceṣṭā-rasaḥ
diśatu sakhi sukhaṃ te pañcabāṇaḥ sa sākṣād
kasmān mlāyasi mālatīva mṛditety ālījane pṛcchati
vyaktaṃ noditam ārtayāpi virahe śālīnayā bālayā
akṣṇor bāṣpa-cayaṃ nigṛhya katham apy ālokitaḥ kevalaṃ
āpāṇḍuḥ kara-pallave ca nibhṛtaṃ śete kapola-sthalī
mugdhe kasya tapaḥ-phalaṃ pariṇataṃ yasmai taveyaṃ daśā
kena prāpto bhuvana-vijayaḥ kaḥ kṛtī kaḥ kalāvān
sakhyas toyendhana iva śikhī vipratīpo 'yam ādhiḥ
saudhād udvijate tyajaty upavanaṃ dveṣṭi prabhām aindavīṃ
dvārāt trasyati citra-keli-sadaso veśaṃ viṣaṃ manyate
manye mugdhāṃ praharati haṭhāt patriṇā vāruṇena
unmīlyākṣi sakhīr na paśyasi na cāpy uktā dadāsy uttaraṃ
no vetsīdṛśam atra nedṛśam imāṃ śūnyām avasthāṃ gatā
muñcantī kim u kartum icchasi kuru premānya-deśa-gate
kiṃ vātena vilaṅghitā na na mahā-bhūtārditā kiṃ na na
bhrāntā kiṃ na na saṃnnipāta-laharī-pracchāditā kiṃ na na
tat kiṃ roditi muhyati śvasiti kiṃ smeraṃ ca dhatte mukhaṃ
dṛṣṭaḥ kiṃ katham apy akāraṇa-ripuḥ śrī-bhojya-devo 'nayā
kucau dhattaḥ kampaṃ nipatati kapolaḥ karatale
prapañco 'yaṃ kiṃcit tava sakhi hṛdi-sthaṃ kathayati
tyajasi na śayanīyaṃ nekṣase svām avasthāṃ
kim api sakhi kuru tvaṃ deha-yātrānurūpaṃ
śatam iha virahiṇyo nedṛśaṃ kvāpi dṛṣṭam
gamanam alasaṃ śūnyā dṛṣṭiḥ śarīram asauṣṭhavaṃ
śvasitam adhikaṃ kiṃ tv etat syāt kim anyad ato 'tha vā
bhramati bhuvane kandarpājñā vikāri ca yauvanaṃ
lalita-madhurās te te bhāvāḥ kṣipanti ca dhīratām
vāraṃ vāraṃ tirayati dṛśor udgamaṃ bāṣpa-pūras
pāṇir lekhā-vidhiṣu nitarāṃ vartate kiṃ karomi
dalati hṛdayaṃ gāḍhodvegaṃ dvidhā na tu bhidyate
vahati vikalaḥ kāyo mohaṃ na muñcate cetanām
jvalati ca tanūm antar-dāhaḥ karoti na bhasmasāt
praharati vidhir marma-cchedī na kṛntati jīvitam
nādatse haritāṅkurān kvacid api sthairyaṃ na yad gāhase
yat paryākula-locano 'si karuṇaṃ kūjan diśaḥ paśyasi
daivenāntarita-priyo 'si hariṇa tvaṃ cāpi kiṃ yac ciraṃ
kaṣṭaṃ viśramayāmi kutra nayane sarvatra vāmo vidhiḥ
savyādheḥ kṛśatā kṣatasya rudhiraṃ daṣṭasya lālā-sravaḥ
sarvaṃ naitad ihāsti tat katham asau pānthas tapasvī mṛtaḥ
iṣubhir aśani-kalpair mā vadhīs tvaṃ mameva
api nanu śaśalakṣman mā mucas tvaṃ ca tasyāṃ
nidre kiṃ viratāsi tāvad aghṛṇe yāvan na tasyāś cirāt
krīḍanti kramaśaḥ kṛśīkṛta-ruṣaḥ pratyaṅgam aṅgāni me
svapnena dviṣatendra-jālam iva me saṃdarśitā kevalaṃ
cetas tat-parirambhaṇāya tad api sphīta-spṛhaṃ tāmyati
deśair antaritā śataiś ca saritām urvī-bhṛtāṃ kānanair
yatnenāpi na yāti locana-pathaṃ kānteti jānann api
tām āśāṃ pathikas tathāpi kim api dhyāyaṃś ciraṃ vīkṣate
snigdhāhlādi madāndham adhvani tayā yac cakṣur āndolitam
tenāsmākam iyaṃ gatir matir iyaṃ saṃvṛttir evaṃvidhā
tāpo 'yaṃ tanur īdṛśī sthitir iyaṃ tasyā apīti śrutiḥ
sa evāyaṃ deśaḥ sara iva vilūnāmbuja-vanaṃ
tanoty antas tāpaṃ nabha iva vilīnāmṛta-ruci
viyoge tanvaṅgyāḥ kalayati sa evāyam adhunā
sṛṣṭā vayaṃ yadi tataḥ kim iyaṃ mṛgākṣī
seyaṃ vayaṃ yadi tataḥ kim ayaṃ vasantaḥ
cūta-drumaḥ kim iti nirmita eṣa dhātrā
te bāṇāḥ kila cūta-kuḍmala-mayāḥ pauṣpaṃ dhanus tat kila
kiṃ brūmo vayam apy anena hatakenāpuṅkha-magnaiḥ śarair
viddhā eva na cedṛśaḥ parikarasyaivaṃ-vidhā vedanā
raktas tvaṃ nava-pallavair aham api ślāghyaiḥ priyāyā guṇais
tvām āyānti śilīmukhāḥ smara-dhanur-muktās tathā mām api
kāntāpāda-talāhatis tava mude tadvan mamāpy āvayoḥ
sarvaṃ tulyam aśoka kevalam ahaṃ dhātrā sa-śokaḥ kṛtaḥ
āpuṅkhāgram amī śarā manasi me magnāḥ samaṃ pañca te
nirdagdhaṃ virahāgninā vapur idaṃ tair eva sārdhaṃ mama
kaṣṭaṃ kāma nirāyudho 'si bhavatā jetuṃ na śakyo jano
duḥkhī syām aham eka eva sakalo lokaḥ sukhaṃ jīvatu
yadi kṣāmā mūrtiḥ pratidivasam aśrūṇi dṛśi cet
idaṃ cāsmat-karṇe yadi bhavati kenāpi kathitaṃ
tad icchāmaḥ saṅgād viraha-bharam ekatra vasatau
saṃbhūyaiva sukhāni cetasi paraṃ bhūmānam ātanvate
tat paśyeyam anaṅga-maṅgala-gṛhaṃ bhūyo 'pi tasyā mukham
saroṣā no jāne mṛgadṛśi vidhāsyanti kim amī
api sa divasaḥ kiṃ syād yatra priyā-mukha-paṅkaje
sā lambālakam ānanaṃ namayati pradveṣṭy ayaṃ māṃ śaśī
naivonmuñcati vācam añcita-kalā vighnanti māṃ kokilāḥ
bhrū-bhaṅgaṃ kurute na sā dhṛta-dhanur mathnāti māṃ manmathaḥ
ko vā tām abalāṃ vilokya sahasā nātropakṛcchro bhavet
bāṇān saṃhara muñca kārmuka-latāṃ lakṣyaṃ tava tryambakaḥ
ke nāmātra vayaṃ śirīṣa-kalikā-kalpaṃ yadīyaṃ manaḥ
tat-kāruṇya-parigrahāt kuru dayām asmin vidheye jane
svāmin manmatha tādṛśaṃ punar api svapnādbhutaṃ darśaya
na jānīmas tasyā bata katham amī yānti divasāḥ
kadā tad draṣṭavyaṃ vadanam avadātaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ
aham iva śūnyam araṇyaṃ vayam iva tanutāṃ gatāni toyāni /
asmākam ivocchvāsā divasā dīrghāś ca taptāś ca //
sā naś cetasi kīliteva viśikhaiś ceto-bhuvaḥ pañcabhiś
bāhu-dvandva-mṛṇālinī yadi vadhūr vāpī punaḥ sā bhavet
calaṃ sūkṣmaṃ lakṣyaṃ vyavahitam amūrtaṃ kva ca manaḥ
itīmām udbhūtāṃ sphuṭam anupapattiṃ manasi me
netre tayā kim api yat punaruktam uktam
upari ghanaṃ ghana-paṭalaṃ dūre kāntā tad etad āpatitam /
te jaṅghe jaghanaṃ ca tat tad udaraṃ tau ca stanau tat smitaṃ
sūktiḥ sā ca tad īkṣaṇotpala-yugaṃ dhammilla-bhāraḥ sa ca
tasyās tad vayam ekam evam asakṛd dhyāyanta evāsmahe
tad ayam adayo mahyaṃ mugdhe kim evam asūyati
jvalayati tu mām ebhir vahni-cchaṭā-kaṭubhiḥ karaiḥ
prāptās tasya viyoginaḥ smṛti-pathaṃ khedaṃ samātanvate
tāsāṃ tāsāṃ nayanam asakṛn naipuṇād vañcayitvā
chinnaṃ chinnaṃ hṛdayam adayaiś chidyate 'dyāpi yair me
śyāmāṃ śyāmalimānam ānayata bhoḥ sāndrair masī-kūrcakais
tantraṃ mantram atha prayujya harata śvetotpalānāṃ smitam
candraṃ cūrṇayata kṣaṇāc ca kaṇaśaḥ kṛtvā śilā-paṭṭake
yena draṣṭum ahaṃ kṣame daśa diśas tad vaktra-mudrāṅkitāḥ
tasmin pañcaśare smare bhagavatā bhargeṇa bhasmīkṛte
yasyāmībhir itas tataś ca viśikhair āpuṅkha-magnātmabhir
haṃho candra kathaṃ nu muñcasi mayi jvālā-muco vedanāḥ
viraha-vidhuritānāṃ jīvita-trāṇa-hetor bhavati hariṇa-lakṣmā yena tejo-daridraḥ //
ity eṣāṃ kim ivāstu hanta madana-jyotir-vighātāya yad
uddhṛta-nayanas tāmyati yathā hi na tatheha jātāndhaḥ //
tatraiva māṃ nayati sā yadi vā na yāti
dṛṣṭiṃ he prativeśini kṣaṇam ihāpy asmin gṛhe dāsyasi
prāyo naiva śiśoḥ pitādya virasāḥ kaupīrapaḥ pāsyati
ekākiny api yāmi tad varam itaḥ srotas tamālākulaṃ
te jāne jaraṭhī-bhavanti vigalan nīla-tviṣaḥ pallavāḥ
kathaya murale kenāmī te kṛtā nicula-drumāḥ
pāntha svaira-gatiṃ vihāya jhaṭiti prasthānam ārabhyatām
caṇḍāṃśor api raśmayaḥ pratidiśaṃ mlānās tvam eko yuvā
sthānaṃ nāsti gṛhe mamāpi bhavato bālāham ekākinī
viṭapini śiśira-cchāye kṣaṇam iha viśramya gamyatāṃ pathikāḥ /
ambā śete 'tra vṛddhā pariṇata-vayasām agraṇīr atra tāto
(Skmsa.u.ka. 548, Smvsū.mu. 87.12 rudrasya, Sbhsu.ā. 2247, Rasg, p. 262, Citkh, p.32, Dhv. ad 2.24)
diśi diśi bhayād bhūyo bhūyaḥ pravartita-netrayā
nibhṛta-nibhṛtaṃ ye cumbyante ta eva viduḥ sukham
yaḥ kaumāra-haraḥ sa eva hi varas tā eva caitra-kṣapās
prāṇādhiko vasati yatra janaḥ priyo me
ekākinī vada kathaṃ na bibheṣi bāle
kuhū kuhūr ity alam āha kokilaḥ
mātar gehini yady ayaṃ hata-śukaḥ saṃvardhanīyas mayā
lauhaṃ pañjaram asya durṇayavato gāḍhāṃ tadā kāraya
karṣantyā mama tāvad aṅga-likhanair evāpad eṣā gatā
dhvastaṃ kena vilepanaṃ kuca-yuge kenāñjanaṃ netrayo
rāgaḥ kena tavādhare pramathitaḥ keśeṣu kena srajaḥ
kiṃ kṛṣṇena na yāmunena payasā kṛṣṇānurāgas tava
kaṇṭhe lagnaḥ sukaṇṭhaḥ punar api kucayor datta-gāḍhāṅga-saṅgaḥ
baddhāsaktir nitambe patati caraṇayor yaḥ sa tādṛk priyo me
bāle lajjā praṇaṣṭā na hi na hi kuṭile colakaḥ kiṃ trapā-kṛt
mattena kiṃ praṇayinā na hi kesareṇa
tvaṃ śrāntāsyavahaṃ ca vartma vasati-grāmo na velāpy agāt
stokonmīlad-asañjitoru vayam apy ekākinaḥ kiṃ tv idam
indur yatra na nindyate na madhuraṃ dūtī-vacaḥ śrūyate
nālāpā nipatanti bāṣpa-kaluṣā nopaiti kārśyaṃ tanuḥ
tat kiṃ prema gṛhāśrama-vratam idaṃ kaṣṭaṃ samācaryate
lakṣmīdharasya | (Sbhsu.ā. 2398, Śp 3782, Smvsū.mu. 75.4, Srb 353.49, Sksa.ka.ā.b 5.192, Śb 3.397, Sab 4.148, Sksa.ka.ā. 5.298, Ssm 937)
śrī-harṣasya -- (Ratnāvalī 3.9, Sbhsu.ā. 2058, Drda.rū. ad. 1.38; Smvsū.mu. 70.10, nāṭ ad. 53)
(Sbhsu.ā. 1937, Srb 352.4, Shv D 24a; Pvpadyā. 4.48 309, Śp 3767, Ssm 409)
gantavyā dayitasya me 'dya vasatir mugdheti kṛtvā matim
netre cumbana-pāṭale ca dadhatī nidrālase nivraṇe
svaṃ saṃketam adūram eva kamitur bhrū-saṃjñayā śaṃsatī
siddhiṃ yāti viṭaika-kalpa-latikā raṇḍā na puṇyair vinā
adya svāṃ jananīm akāraṇa-ruṣā prātaḥ sudūraṃ gatāṃ
pratyānektum ito gato gṛha-patiḥ śrutvaiva madhyaṃ-dine
dṛṣṭo 'sau bhavatā na kiṃ pathika he sthitvā kṣaṇaṃ kathyatām
jhaṅkārair vikalīkṛtāḥ pathi bata vyaktaṃ kuraṅgī-dṛśaḥ
gṛhād vāraṃ vāraṃ nirasarad atha prāviśad atha
śaśabhṛti vitata-dhāmni dhavalayati dharām avibhāvyatāṃ gatāḥ
priya-vasatiṃ vrajanti sukham eva mitho nirasta-bhiyo 'bhisārikāḥ
bāṇasya | (Skmsa.u.ka. 797; Vām ad 4.310, Ak p.396, As. ad 71, Srb 299.23, Kpd ad. 10.48)
pathi skhalantī bata vāridhārām āliṅgituṃ vāñchanti vāri-dānām //
kasmai kupyasi yāvad asmi calitā tāvad vidhi-preritaḥ
urasi nihitas tāro hāraḥ kṛtā jaghane ghane
netre dūram anañjane jala-lava-prasyandinī te tanuḥ
vāpīṃ snātum ito gatāsi na punas tasyādhamasyāntikam
kasyacit | (Sksa.ka.ā. 4.236, SD under 2.23, Smvsū.mu. 48.2, Skmsa.u.ka. 1036 suvibhokasya)
madīyaṃ yad vāsaḥ katham api hṛtaṃ tena suhṛdā
(Smvsū.mu. 48.7, Śp 3509 bījākarasya; Sbhsu.ā. 1437 bījakasya, Ssm 497, Sab 3.48 bījāṅkurasya; Sg 64b)
nāyāto yadi tādṛśaṃ sa śapathaṃ kṛtvāpi dūti priyas
tat kiṃ kopanayā tvayā sva-daśanair agrādharaḥ khaṇḍitaḥ
svedāmbhaḥ-kaṇa-dāyi vepanam idaṃ tyaktvā bhaja svasthatāṃ
romāñcaṃ vahasi śvasiṣy avirataṃ dhyānaṃ kim apy āśritā
dṛṣṭis te bhramati prakampa-capale vyaktaṃ ca te śītkṛtam
taṃ labdhvā khalu bandhakīva surata-vyāpāra-dakṣaṃ janaṃ
kiṃ dūti jvaritāsi pāpam athavā spṛṣṭvā bhavanty āpadaḥ
śvāsaḥ kiṃ tvaritā gatiḥ pulakitā kasmāt prasādyāgatā
veṇī bhraśyati pādayor nipatanāt kṣāmā kim ity uktibhiḥ
svedārdraṃ mukham ātapena galitā nīvī gamād āgamād
saṃkṣobhitaṃ mano me jalanidhir iva manda-rāgeṇa //
dūte rāga-parābhavaḥ kriyata ity etan na mīmāṃsitam
dūti bhraṣṭa-guṇasya tasya nilayaṃ svapne 'pi mā gāḥ punaḥ
kasmān nirvāṇa-lābhī na bhavatu parama-brahmavad vīkṣya dīpaḥ
unmuktābhir divasam adhunā sarvatas tābhir eva
svacchāyābhir niculitam iva prekṣyate viśvam etat
paryanteṣu jvalati jaladhau ratnasānau ca madhye
kiṃ cāmī śalyayantas timiram ubhayato nirbharāhas tamisrā
strī-lokocitam ācaranti sukṛtaṃ vahnau vilīya tviṣaḥ
apy etās tu cikīrṣayeva tapasāṃ tārākṣa-mālā diśo
dyauḥ pratyagra-dyumaṇi-virahād vāntam akṣṇor na yāti
parāvṛttā gāvas taruṣu vayasāṃ kūjati kulaṃ
udbhedais tārakāṇāṃ viyati parigate paścimāśām upetā
prāyaḥ saṃdhyātapāgniṃ viśati dinapatau dahyate vāsara-śrīḥ
prārabdho maṇi-dīpa-yaṣṭiṣu vṛthā pātaḥ pataṅgair itoaḥ
vyāpārāś ca niyojayanti vividhān varāṅganā varṇakān
cchavi-ravir asau svecchā-dṛśyau diśaṃ bhṛśam ap-pateḥ
śirasi śirasi svairaṃ svairaṃ patanti patattriṇaḥ
janayati hi vitarkān sāndhyam arkasya bimbam
anurūpārgham alabdhvā punar iva ratnākare nihitaḥ //
tad-anu valanā-mātraṃ kiṃcid vyadhāyi bahir dalair
kiṃ svarbhānur asau vilimpati jagad dehaprabhāvistaraiḥ
tīvrāṃśoḥ patataḥ pataty atha karālambāvakṛṣṭaṃ nabhaḥ
kiṃ sāmbhodhikulābalāṃ vasumatīṃ svasmin vidhatte hariḥ
saṃkalpān iti māṃsalaṃ vitanute kādambanīlaṃ tamaḥ
śocyante vayasāṃ gaṇair ita itaḥ paryantacaityadrumāḥ
pārśvasthā iva bhānti hanta kakubho niḥsandhiruddhāntarāḥ
vṛthonmeṣaṃ cakṣur muhur upadadhānaḥ pathi pathi
hā kaṣṭaṃ ka iha kṣamaḥ pratikṛtau kasyaitad āvedyatāṃ
grastaṃ hanta niśācarair iva tamaḥ-stobhaiḥ samastaṃ jagat
kālaḥ so 'pi kim asti yatra bhagavān udgamya śīta-dyutir
dhvāntaughād bhuvam uddhariṣyati hariḥ pātāla-garbhād iva
paryantāḥ prānta-vṛttyā payasi vasumatī nūtane majjatīva
prārambhe 'pi triyāmā taruṇayati nijaṃ nīlimānaṃ vaneṣu
ārūḍhasya bhareṇa yauvanam iva dhvāntasya naktaṃ mukhe
tanu-lagnā iva kakubhaḥ kṣmā-valayaṃ caraṇa-cāra-mātram iva /
viyad iva cālika-daghnaṃ muṣṭi-grāhyaṃ tamaḥ kurute //
lokāḥ śokaṃ tyajata na cira-sthāyinī dhvānta-vṛttir
bhadre yāyāḥ kumudini mudaṃ muñca mohaṃ cakora
karpūraiḥ kim apūri kiṃ malayajair ālepi kiṃ pāradair
akṣāli sphaṭikopalaiḥ kim aghaṭi dyāv-āpṛthivyor vapuḥ
candraḥ sundari dṛśyatām ayam itaś caṇḍīśa-cūḍāmaṇiḥ
chāyā-pathaś ca na bhavaty ayam asya setuḥ
śeṣo na lāñchanam idaṃ harir eṣa suptaḥ
kapāle mārjāraḥ paya iti karān leḍhi śaśinaḥ
ratānte talpa-sthān harati vanitāpy aṃśukam iva
prabhā-mattaś candro jagad idam aho viklavayati
bhavati bhaviṣyati kim idaṃ nipatiṣyati bimbam ambarād śaśinaḥ /
aham api candana-paṅkair aṅkam anaṅkaṃ kariṣyāmi //
marudbhir bhasmeva prasarati vikīrṇaṃ diśi diśi
apy usrair dhavalī-bhavatsu giriṣu kṣubdho 'yam unmajjatā
viśveneva tamo-mayo nidhir apām ahnāya phenāyate
kṣīvotsaṅga-kuraṅgam aindavam idaṃ tad bimbam ujjṛmbhate
naivāyaṃ bhagavān udañcati śaśī gavyūti-mātrīm api
dyām adyāpi tamas tu kaurava-kula-śrī-cāṭu-kārāḥ karāḥ
jīva-grāham iva kvacit kvacid api cchāyāsu gṛhṇanti ca
kiṃ nu dhvānta-payodhir eṣa kataka-kṣodair ivendoḥ karair
atyaccho 'yam adhaś ca paṅkam akhilaṃ chāyāpadeśād abhūt
kiṃ vā tat-kara-kartarībhir abhito nistakṣaṇād ujjvalaṃ
vyomaivedam itas tataś ca patitāś chāyā-chalena tvacaḥ
yaṃ prāk pratyag avāg udañci kakubhāṃ nāmāni saṃbibhrataṃ
prācīnād acalād itas tri-jagatām āloka-bījād bahir
niryāntaṃ hariṇāṅkam aṅkuram iva draṣṭuṃ jano jīvati
śaśinam asūta prācī nṛtyati madano hasanti kakubho 'pi /
dūrārūḍhe pramode hasitam iva parispaṣṭam āśā-vadhūbhiḥ
sthātuṃ vāñchati māna eṣa dhig iti krodhād ivālohitaḥ
vasukalpasya | (Mn 2.41, Skmsa.u.ka. 376, Spdśā.pa. 3636, Sdsā.da. under 7.4, Kp 237)
svairaṃ śītakaraḥ karaṃ kamalinīm āliṅgituṃ yojayan
śīta-sparśam avāpya saṃprati tathā gupte mukhāmbhoruhe
tamobhir dikkālair viyad api vilaṅghya kva nu gataṃ
gatā drāṅmudrāpi kva nu kumuda-koṣasya sarasaḥ
kva dhairyaṃ tac cābdher viditam udayādreḥ pratisara
sthalī-madhyāsīne śaśini jagad apy ākulam idam
candraḥ kṣīram iva kṣaraty avirataṃ dhārā-sahasrotkarair
udgrīvais tṛṣitair ivādya kumudair jyotsnā-payaḥ pīyate
tat kṣobhāj jala-budbudā iva tarantyālohitās tārakāḥ
udayati gagana-sarasi haṃsasya hasann iva vibhramaṃ śaśī
skhalan prāleyāṃśur yadi bhavati matto haladharaḥ
yathāyaṃ bhāty aṃśūn diśi diśi kiran kunda-viśadān
tad anu ca nava-svarṇāmbhoja-prabhaṃ śaśinas tatas
aiśānam iva kapālaṃ sphuṭa-lakṣma sphurati śaśibimbam //
pātavyā ca śaśiny-amugdha-vibhave sā vartate candrikā
ye dhārāmbu-viḍambinaḥ kṣaṇam atho ye tāra-hāra-śriyas
pragalbho gaṇḍālī na vidhur ayam akṣuṇṇa-kiraṇaḥ
tad akṣaṇaḥ sīmneyaṃ yad-urasi manāg añjana-mayī
mṛga-cchāyā daivād aghaṭi na kalaṅkaḥ punar ayam
kṣaṇād antaḥ-śalyaṃ tapati patir adyāpi na rucām
dve tisro ramaṇīyam ambara-maṇer dyām uccarante rucaḥ
sūkṣmocchvāsam apīdam utsukatayā saṃbhūya koṣād bahir
bhūyo 'pi kramaśaḥ prasārayati tāḥ saṃpraty amūn udyataḥ
saṃkhyātuṃ sakutūhaleva nalinī bhānoḥ sahasraṃ karān
prācī bāla-biḍālalocanarucāṃ yātā ca pātraṃ kakup
kṣīṇāny eva tamāṃsi kintu dadhati prauḍhi na samyag-dṛśor
vāsaḥ saṃvṛttam eva kintu jahati prāṇeśvaraṃ nābalāḥ
sākūtaṃ rutam eva kintu bahalaṃ sātkṛtya noḍḍīyate
prasarpata tamāṃsi re samaya eṣa yuṣmādṛśām
prātaḥ kopa-vilohitena raviṇā dhvastaṃ tamaḥ sarvato
bhṛṅgāḥ padma-puṭeṣu varṇa-sadṛśās tasyeti kṛṣṭāḥ karaiḥ
hā kaṣṭaṃ timira-tviṣo vayam api vyaktaṃ hatā ity amī
kākāḥ saṃprati ghoṣayanti sabhayāḥ kāketi nāmnātmanaḥ
pratibhāti yatra hariṇaḥ sa hariṇa-lakṣmā gato 'sta-mayam //
patyau yāte kalānāṃ vrajati gati-vaśād astam indau krameṇa
stoka-stokam abhūmir ambara-tale tārābhir astaṃ gataṃ
gacchanty asta-gireḥ śiras tad-anu ca cchāyā-daridraḥ śaśī
mañjiṣṭhā-rasa-lohinī dig api ca prācī samunmīlati
savitur api ca prācī-mūle milanti marīcayaḥ
bhraśyaty eṣa praśithila iva śrotra-śaṅkhaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ
āmudrantas tama iva saraḥ-sīmni saṃbhūya paṅkaṃ
kāsāre sphuṭitodare sunibhṛtaṃ kīṭair ahar nīyate
paścāt tāpa-bhareṇa tānava-kṛtā nītā paraṃ lāghavam
āyuḥ karma samāpayanti dhig amūr madhye 'hni śūnyā diśaḥ
adhyetṝṇāṃ dadhānaṃ bhṛśam ala-sadṛśāṃ kiṃcid aṅgāvasādaṃ
devasyaitat samantād bhavatu samucita-śreyase madhyam ahnaḥ
dātyūhais tiniśasya koṭaravati skandhe nilīya sthitaṃ
cchāyāḥ saṃprati yānti piṇḍa-padavīṃ mūleṣu bhūmīruhām
dhatte padma-latā-dalepsur upari khaṃ karṇatālaṃ dvipaḥ
śaṣpa-stamba-rasān niyacchati śikhī madhye śikhaṇḍaṃ śiraḥ
kuhuṅkāra-sphāraṃ racayati ca nādaṃ namati ca
viṣvaṅ murmura-narma bibhrati pathāṃ garbheṣv adabhrāḥ paṭu
pānthaḥ kiṃ ca marīci-vīciṣu payaḥ-pūra-bhramaḥ klāmati
pānthāḥ potavad āpibanti kaluṣaṃ dhānyāḥ prataptaṃ payaḥ
deva svasti vayaṃ dvijās tata itas tīrtheṣu sisnāsavaḥ
kiṃ vṛttāntaiḥ para-gṛha-gataiḥ kiṃtu nāhaṃ samarthas
deśe deśe vipaṇiṣu tathā catvare pāna-goṣṭhyām
unmatteva bhramati bhavato vallabhā hanta kīrtiḥ
sā candrād api candanād api dara-vyākoṣa-kundād api
kṣīrābdher api śeṣato 'pi phaṇinaś caṇḍīśa-hāsād api
yat kṣāraṃ ca malīmasaṃ ca jaladher ambhas tad ambhodharaiḥ
kṛtvā svādu ca nirmalaṃ ca nihitaṃ yatnena śuktau tathā
yenānarghatayā ca sundaratayā cedaṃ yaśobhis tava
spardhām etya virājate nanu pariṇāmo 'dbhuto bhautikaḥ
nyastaṃ cetasi khañjanaiḥ sukavibhiḥ kāvyeṣu saṃcāritam
utkīrṇaṃ kuśalaiḥ praśastiṣu sadā gītaṃ ca nākeṣadāṃ
ko vindhyaḥ kaś ca gaurī-gurur iti marutām abhyudasto vivekaḥ
rājann uddāma-gaurair ajani ca rajanī-vallabhas tvad-yaśo bhoḥ
kṣemaṃ me 'nyad yugāntāvadhi tapatu bhavān yad-yaśo-ghoṣaṇābhiḥ
devo nidrā-daridraḥ saphalayati harir yauvana-rddhiṃ mameti
kā tvaṃ, kuntala-malla-kīrtir, ahaha kvāsi sthitā, na kvacit
sakhyas tās tava kutra kutra vada vāg lakṣmīs tathā kāntayaḥ
vāg yātā caturānanasya vadanaṃ lakṣmīr murārer uraḥ
kāntir maṇḍalam aindavaṃ mama punar nādyāpi viśrāma-bhūḥ
āsīd uptaṃ yad etad raṇa-bhuvi bhavatā vairi-mātaṅga-kumbhān
muktā-bījaṃ tad etat trijagati janayāmāsa kīrti-drumaṃ te
śeṣo mūlaṃ prakāṇḍaṃ hima-girir udadhir dugdha-pūrālavālaṃ
jyotsnā śākhā-pratānaḥ kusumam uḍu-cayo yasya candraḥ phalaṃ ca
svāminn aṅka-mṛgaḥ kiyanti hi dināny etasya vartiṣyate
samayasulabhāṃ kīrtiṃ bhavyām asūta sutām asāv
api ramayituṃ rāgāndheva bhramaty akhilaṃ jagat
kiṃ tv ekaḥ param asti dūṣaṇa-kaṇo yan nopayāti bhramāt
kṛṣṇaṃ śrīḥ śiti-kaṇṭham adri-tanayā nīlāmbaraṃ revatī
pāraṃ laṅghitavān purā tad adhunā nāścaryam utpādayet
ekākiny api setu-bandha-rahitān saptāpi vārāṃ nidhīn
helābhis tava deva kīrti-vanitā yasmāt samullaṅghati
na tac citraṃ yat te vitata-karavālogra-rasano
kathaya kuhaka-krīḍāścaryaṃ kathaṃ kva ca śikṣitam
tvaṃ kāmboja virājase bhuvi bhavat-tāto divi bhrājate
tat-tātas tu vibhūṣaṇaḥ sa kim api brahmaukasi dyotate
yuṣmābhis tribhir ebhir arpita-tanus tvat-kīrtir ujjṛmbhiṇī
ābhāsante vada dhavalitaṃ kiṃ yaśobhis tvadīyaiḥ
aye muktā-ratna prasara bahir uddyotaya gṛhān
api kṣoṇīndrāṇāṃ kuru phalavataḥ svān api guṇān
mahā-gambhīro 'yaṃ jaladhir iha kas tvāṃ gaṇayati
vāso nālpa-tapaḥ-phalaṃ yad aparaṃ doṣo 'yam eko mahān
śambūko 'pi yad atra durlabhatarair ratnair anarghaiḥ saha
nīre 'smin amṛtāṃśum utsukatayā kartuṃ kare kautukin
mā nimne 'vatarārjavād iyam adhas tasya praticchāyikā
vikretuṃ vā tvam abhilaṣitaḥ kena deśāntare 'smin
mūrdhāropaṇa-satkṛtair diśi diśi kṣudrair vihaṅgair gataṃ
hā kaṣṭaṃ phala-lolupair apasṛtaṃ śākhāmṛgaiś cañcalair
ayaṃ vārām eko nilaya iti ratnākara iti
apy asmād avatāra eva bhavato nonmāda-bherī-ravaḥ
samyaṅ mūrchiti-kelayaḥ punar ime bhṛṅga dvir abhyāhatiḥ
kā vārtā yudhi gandha-sindhura-pateḥgr gandho 'pi cet ke dvipāḥ
jetavyo 'sti hareḥ sa lāñchanam ato vandāmahe tām abhūd
yad-garbhe śarabhaḥ svayaṃjaya iti śrutvāpi yo nāṅkitaḥ
kallolāḥ kṣaṇa-bhaṅgurāḥ punar amī nītāḥ parām unnatim
antaḥ prastara-saṃgraho bahir api bhraśyanti gandha-drumā
bhrātaḥ śoṇa na so 'sti yo na hasati tvat-saṃpadāṃ viplave
kim ebhir nirghoṣaiḥ sṛja jhaṭiti jhātkāri salilam
kāle yad enam avanī-ruham etad astu
sa vandyaḥ pāthodaḥ sa khalu nayanānanda-jananaḥ
kathāpi śrotavyā bhavati hata-ketor na ca punar
janānāṃ dhvaṃsāya prabhavati hi yasyodgatir api
tat-tejaś ca tad ūrjitaṃ sa ca nagonmāthī ninādo mahān
sarvaṃ viśva-jayaika-sādhanam idaṃ labdhaṃ na kiṃcit kṛtam
tiṣṭhantu nāma taravaḥ phalitā natāś ca
yan nīḍa-prabhavo yad añjana-rucir yat khecaro yad dvijas
tena tvaṃ svajanaḥ kileti karaṭair yat tair upabrūyase
doṣo 'bhūt kalakaṇṭha-nāyaka nijas teṣāṃ svabhāvo hi saḥ
kiṃ te namratayā kim unnatatayā kiṃ te ghana-cchāyayā
kiṃ te pallava-līlayā kim anayā cāśoka puṣpa-śriyā
na svādūni mṛdūni khādati phalāny ākaṇṭham utkaṇṭhitaḥ
kalyāṇaṃ naḥ kim adhikam ito vartanārthaṃ yad asmāl
kiṃ tv etasminn aśani-piśunair ātapair ākulānām
nāmany anta tadātanīm api nija-cchāyākṣitiṃ taiḥ punas
teṣām eva tale kṛtajña-caritaiḥ śuṣyadbhir apy āsyate
gate daivād śoṣaṃ vara-sarasi tatraiva taralā
yad vīcībhiḥ spṛśasi gaganaṃ yac ca pātāla-mūlaṃ
ratnair udyotayasi payasā yat dharitrīṃ pidhatse
dhik tat sarvaṃ tava jalanidhe yad vimucyāśru-dhārās
mādyaty atrabhramu-vallabho 'pi satataṃ tat kālakūṭaṃ viṣam
smero 'yaṃ śarabhaḥ parāṃ hṛdi ghṛṇām āyāti jāti-smaraḥ
ekenāpi payodhinā jalamucas te pūritāḥ koṭiśo
saṃbhūyāpi vidhātum asya rajasi staimityam apy akṣamāḥ
na kṣubhyanty eva tāvan niyamita-salilāḥ sarvadaite samudrāḥ
āho kṣobhaṃ vrajeyuḥ kvacid api samaye daiva-yogāt tadānīṃ
na kṣoṇī nādri-vargā na ca ravi-śaśinau sarvam ekārṇavaṃ syāt
śrutaṃ dūre ratnākara iti paraṃ nāma jaladher
puro naḥ saṃprāptās taṭa-bhuvi salipsaṃ tu vasatām
tvām ālokya mahīruhaṃ vayam amī mārgaṃ vihāyāgatāḥ
patana-vidhaye pakṣau syātāṃ na yāvad imau kṣamau
dhatte jarat-kapir apīti kim atra vācyam
kva malaya-taṭī janma-sthānaṃ kva te ca vanecarāḥ
kva ca khara-śilā-paṭṭe ghṛṣṭiḥ kva paṅka-sarūpatā
malayaja sakhe mā gāḥ khedaṃ guṇās tava dūṣaṇam
katham api yadi dṛṣṭaṃ vārivāhaṃ vihāya
uccair unmathitasya tena balinā daivena dhik-karmaṇā
lakṣmīm asya nirasyato jalanidher jātaṃ kim etāvatā
gāmbhīryaṃ kim ayaṃ jahāti kim ayaṃ puṣṇāti nāmbhodharān
maryādāṃ kim ayaṃ bhinatti kim ayaṃ na trāyate vāḍavam
tvad-vāsāya sa eva kīrṇa-kanaka-jyotsno girīṇāṃ patiḥ
vyāpyāśāḥ śayitasya vīci-śikharair ullikhya khaṃ preṅkhataḥ
sindhor locana-gocarasya mahimā teṣāṃ tanoty adbhutam
yair nāyaṃ kara-śuktikodara-laghur dṛṣṭo muner añjalau
bhekaiḥ koṭara-śāyibhir mṛtam iva kṣmāntargataṃ kacchapaiḥ
tasminn eva sarasy akāla-jaladenāgatya tac ceṣṭitaṃ
dvandūkasya | (Bp 201, Svsu.ā. 843, dakṣiṇātyasya; Spdśā.pa. 777, akālajaladasya; Skmsa.u.ka. 1755, chittapasya)
haṃho siṃha-kiśoraka tyajasi cet kopaṃ vadāmas tadā
hatvainaṃ kariṇāṃ sahasram akhilaṃ kiṃ labdham āyuṣmatā
evaṃ kartum ahaṃ samartha iti ced dhiṅ mūrkha kiṃ sarvato
nālaṃ plāvayituṃ jagaj-jala-nidhir dhairyam yad ālambate
san-mārgo 'yam alaṃkṛtaḥ kim aparaṃ tvaṃ mūrti-bhedo hareḥ
nyagrodhe phala-śālini sphuṭa-rasaṃ kiṃcit phalaṃ pacyate
bījāny aṅkura-gocarāṇi katicit sidhyanti tatrāpi ca
ekas tatra sa kaścid aṅkura-varo badhnāti tām unnatiṃ
yām adhyan yajanaḥ svamātaram iva klānti-cchide dhāvati
etasmin kusume svabhāva-mahati prāyo garīyaḥ phalaṃ
ramyaṃ svādu sugandhi śītalam alaṃ prāptavyam ity āśayā
sthāne maitryam idaṃ payaḥ paya iti kṣīrasya nīrasya ca
tatrāpy arṇasi varṇanā sphurati me yat-saṃgatau vardhate
dugdhaṃ yena puraiva cāsya suhṛdaḥ kvāthe svayaṃ kṣīyate
dāraiḥ krīḍitam unmadaiḥ sura-guros tenaiva naivāmunā
naivāyaṃ sa imaṃ nṛjaḥ sa iva vā naivaiṣa doṣākaraḥ
ko 'yaṃ bhoḥ śaśinīva locanavatām arke kalaṅkaḥ samaḥ
āyānti yānti satataṃ nīraṃ śiśiraṃ kharaṃ na gaṇayanti /
vidmo na hanta divasāḥ kasya kim ete kariṣyanti //
harer nābhī-padmaḥ prabhavati hi sarvatra niyatiḥ
yad atraiva brahmā pibati nijam āyur madhu punar
piśācā valgantu sthagayatu tamisraṃ ca kakubhaḥ
upādhvaṃ tat pānthāḥ punar api saro mārga-tilakaṃ
nivṛttiḥ kalyāṇī na punar avatāraḥ katham api
sa-līlaṃ haṃsānāṃ pibati nivaho yatra vimalaṃ
jalaṃ tasmin mohāt sarasi rucire cātaka-yuvā
svabhāvād garvād vā na pibati payas tasya śakunaiḥ
kim etenoccais tvaṃ bhavati laghimā vāpi sarasaḥ
prasīda prārambhād virama vinayethāḥ krudham imāṃ
hare jīmūtānāṃ dhvanir ayam udīrṇo na kariṇām
prakṛtyā garjanti tvayi tu bhuvanaṃ nirmadam idam
tadā jānīmas te karivara balodgāram asamaṃ
samutkṣipto 'smīti tvam iha paritāpaṃ tyaja maṇe
aśoke śokārtaḥ kim asi bakule 'py ākula-manāḥ
nirānandaḥ kunde saha ca sahakārair na ramase
kusumbhe viśrambhaṃ yad iha bhajase kaṇṭaka-śatair
pātaḥ pūṣṇo bhavati mahate naiva khedāya yasmāt
kālenāstaṃ ka iha na gatā yānti yāsyanti cānye
garjaty eva kṣipati viṣamaṃ vaidyutaṃ vahnim anyaḥ
sūte vātaṃ javanam aparas tena jānīhi tāvat
kiṃ vyādatse vihaga vadanaṃ tatra tatrāmbuvāhe
mā sañcaiṣīḥ phala-samudayaṃ mā ca patraiḥ pidhās tvaṃ
rodhaḥ-śākhin vitara tad idaṃ dānam evānukūlam
adya śvo vā sarid akaruṇā tvāṃ śriyā pātayitrī
āmodais te diśi diśi gatair dūram ākṛṣyamāṇāḥ
sākṣāl lakṣmyās tava malayaja draṣṭum abhyāgatāḥ smaḥ
paśyāmaḥ kiṃ subhaga bhavataḥ krīḍati kroḍa eva
vyāḍas tubhyaṃ bhavatu kuśalaṃ muñca naḥ sādhayāmaḥ
aṇur api nanu naiva kroḍa-bhūṣāsya kācid
iha sarasi manojñe saṃtataṃ pātum ambhaḥ
dhvanir api madhuras te na śrutaś cātakena
kim asi nitarām uktṣubhormiḥ prasīda namo 'stu te
pathi pathi śivāḥ santy asmākaṃ śataṃ kamalākarāḥ
kakubhi kakubhi bhrāntvā bhrāntvā vilokya vilokitaṃ
adhikam adhikaṃ yat saurabhyaṃ tanoti manoharam
baddho 'si viddhi tāvan madhu-rasana vyasanam īdṛg etad iti /
hṛtvāpi vasu-sarvasvam amī te jaladāḥ sakhi /
mitrāpy apakurvanti vipriyāṇāṃ tu kā kathā //
tvaṃ garja nāma visṛjāmbuda nāmbu nāma
etasya paśya vihagasya gatis tvam eva
vetraṃ ca vāsukir ayaṃ girir eṣa manthaḥ
vyākurmahe bahu kim asya taroḥ sadaiva
itthaṃ na kiṃcid api cāru mṛgādhipasya
tejas tu tat kim api yena jagad-varākam
kasya tṛṣaṃ na kṣapayasi na payasi tava kathaya ke nimajjanti /
yadi san-mārga-jalāśaya nakro na kroḍam adhivasati //
na sphūrjati na ca garjati na ca karakāḥ kirati sṛjati na ca taḍitaḥ /
na ca vinimuñcati vātyāṃ varṣati nibhṛtaṃ mahā-meghaḥ //
rikto 'si yaj jalada saiva tavonnatā śrīḥ
viśrāma-drumaṃ kathyatāṃ tava vipat-kāle kva te sāmpratam
yāsāṃ chedanam antareṇa patito nāyaṃ kuṭhāras tvayi
sañcūrṇayasy api dṛḍhaṃ yadi vā śilābhiḥ
nānyā gatis tad api vārida cātakasya
hanta dhvānta kim edhase diśi diśi vyomnaḥ pratispardhayā
eṣa tvāṃ kalitaḥ kalābhir udayaty agre śaśī pārvaṇaḥ
dhanyas tvaṃ sahakāra saṃprati phalaiḥ kākān śukān pūrayan
pūrvaṃ tu tvayi mukta-mañjari-bharonnidre ya indindaraḥ
ākrīḍan nimiṣaṃ sa naiti phalitaṃ yat tvāṃ vikaśaika-mut
tad-dharmo 'sya phalāśayā paricayaḥ kalpa-drume 'py asti kim
snigdhaṃ pallavito ghanaṃ mukulitaḥ sphāra-cchaṭaṃ puṣpitaḥ
sotkarṣaṃ phalito bhṛśaṃ ca vinataḥ ko 'py eṣa cūta-drumaḥ
jāyante bahavo 'tra kacchapa-kule kiṃ tu kvacit kacchapī
naikāpy ekam asūta nāpi ca punaḥ sūtena vā soṣyate
yaḥ kūrmasya dināni nāma katicid viśrāma-dāna-kṣamaḥ
bhagavati yāmini vande tvayi bhuvi dṛṣṭaḥ pativratā-dharmaḥ /
dhig etad gāmbhīryaṃ dhig amṛtamayatvaṃ ca jaladher
toyaṃ tvayā tad api niṣkaruṇena pītam
vidadhati tathāparādhaṃ janmaiva yathā vṛthā bhavati //
vinīto 'yaṃ veśaḥ śamam iva nadīnāṃ kathayati
tathāpy āsāṃ tais tais tarubhir abhitas tīra-patitaiḥ
sa evāgre buddhau pariṇamati ruddho 'py avinayaḥ
satataṃ yā madhyasthā prathayati yaṣṭiḥ pratiṣṭhitāsīti /
puṣkariṇi kim idam ucitaṃ tāṃ cedānīm adho nayasi //
kṛtam idam asādhu hariṇaiḥ śirasi tarūṇāṃ davānale jvalati /
ājanma keli-bhavanaṃ yad bhītair ujjhitaṃ vipinam //
kasyacit (Spdśā.pa. 1159, Smvsū.mu. 34.5 both anonymous, Skmsa.u.ka. 1271 yogeśvarasya)
citraṃ tad eva mahad aśmasu tāpaneṣu yad
saṃbhāvyate 'pi kim idaṃ nu yathendukāntās te
pāvanaṃ ca śiśiraṃ ca rasaṃ sṛjanti
dāha-ccheda-nikāṣair ati pariśuddhasya te vṛthā garimā /
yad asi tulām adhirūḍhaṃ kāṃcana guñjāphalaiḥ sārdham //
dagdhaḥ kiṃ vā na bhavati masī ceti saṃdehinībhiḥ
chidraṃ maṇer guṇārthaṃ nāyaka-pada-hetur asya tāralyam /
katham anyatheśvarāṇāṃ viluṭhati hṛdaye ca maulau ca //
katham iva tava bhṛṣṭo rājakīraḥ karotu
kiṃpāka pāke bahir eva rakta tiktāsitāntar dṛśi kāntim eṣi /
etāvatā kākam apāsya kasya hṛt-prīti-bhittis tvam idaṃ na jāne //
vigarjām unmuñca tyaja taralatām arṇava manāg
dṛśaṃ merau dadyāḥ sa hi maṇimaya-prastha-mahito
mahā-maunaḥ sthairyād atha bhuvanam eva sthirayati
ājñām eva muner nidhāya śirasā vindhyācala sthīyatām
atyuccaiḥ padam icchatā punar iyaṃ no laṅghanīyā tvayā
tasya tvāṃ gilataḥ kapola-milana-kleśo 'pi kiṃ jāyate
tac cāsphāla-sahaṃ saraḥ kṣiti-bhṛtām ity asti ko nihnute
yenāyaṃ virahī tu vāraṇa-patiḥ svāmin sa vindhyo bhavān
cumbanto vānti mandaṃ malaya-parimalā vāyavo dākṣiṇātyāḥ
cumbann ānanam āluṭhan stana-taṭīm āndolayan kuntalaṃ
aṅgaṃ vihvalayan mano vikalayan mānaṃ samunmūlayan
nārīṇāṃ malayānilaḥ priya iva pratyaṅgam āliṅgati
marun mandaṃ mandaṃ vicarati parivrājaka iva
suptaṃ saṃprati bodhayanti śanakaiś ceto-bhuvaṃ kāmināṃ
mandaṃ mandaṃ nipatati cirād āgato mādhavīṣu
vyākurvāṇo bhayam iva paraṃ dākṣiṇo gandhavāhaḥ
amī svairaṃ svairaṃ malaya-maruto vānti dinajaṃ
ye dolākelikārāḥ kim api mṛga-dṛśāṃ manyu-tantu-cchido ye
te kaṇṭhe loṭhayantaḥ para-bhṛta-vayasāṃ pañcamaṃ rāga-rājaṃ
paśyodagra-plutatvād viyati bahutaraṃ stokam urvyāṃ prayāti
kālidāsasya | (śak. 1.7 Han. 4.3, Smk 93.1, Pmt 177, Ssm 993, Kvv 32, Ipk 42, Kpd, 83, Aś p.74 ad. 20.23, Ekāvalī p.101, Ak, p. 327, Amd 127, Vyk 2.120, Srb 207.7)
svairaṃ cakrānuvṛttyā muhur upari paribhramya samyak kṛtāsthaḥ
bhoga-śroṇir udasyati pratimuhuḥ kūpād apaḥ pāmarī
pakṣābhyāṃ sahitau prasārya caraṇāv ekaikaśaḥ pārśvayor
kiṃcit kuñcita-locanāṃ sahacarīṃ saṃcumbya cañcvā ciraṃ
dhārādhvāna-manoharaṃ sakhi payo gāṃ dogdhi dāmodaraḥ
tundī cet paricumbati priyatamāṃ svārthāt tato bhraśyati
svārthaṃ cet kurute priyādhara-rasāsvādaṃ na vindaty asau
taṃ cemaṃ ca karoti mūḍha-jaḍa-dhīḥ kāmāndha-mugdho yatas
tundau tundita-vigrahasya surate naiko bhaven nāparaḥ
payasi sarasaḥ svacche matsyāñjighṛkṣur itas tato
valita-nayano mandaṃ mandaṃ padaṃ nidadhad bakaḥ
dalam api calat sa-pratyāśaṃ muhur muhur īkṣate
paścād aṅghrī prasārya tri-kanati-vitataṃ drāghayitvāṅgam uccair
āsajyābhugna-kaṇṭho mukham urasi saṭāṃ ghūli-dhūmrāṃ vidhūya
mandaṃ śabdāyamāno vilikhati śayanād utthitaḥ kṣmāṃ khureṇa
protthāya drāṅ nirīhaḥ kṣaṇam atha vapur āsyānupūrvyāṃ dhunoti
utthāpya vaktram abhihatya muhuś ca vatsāḥ
mṛtgaḥ paścād ālokayati ca muhur yāti ca muhuḥ
dūrādhva-bhrānti-khinnaḥ katham api śanakair aṅghri-pīḍāṃ niyamya
svairendha-sphoṭanāya dvija-bhavanam anu snātakaḥ sāyam eti
svairaṃ sarpan sṛjati gagane gatvarān patra-bhaṅgān
prakṣīṇair nija-vaṃśa-bhūr iti mitair atyajyamānāḥ kulaiḥ
bahir vrajati sātape smarati netra-varteḥ pumān
nyag-bhūtāṃ caṭakaḥ priyām abhisaraty udvepamānaḥ kṣaṇam
dhūmyāṭāḥ paryaṭanti prativiṭapam amī niṣṭhurāḥ sva-sthalīṣu
pītād apy adhikaṃ tapo-vana-mṛgaḥ paryāptam ācāmati
gandhena sphuratā manāg anusṛto bhaktasya sarpiṣmataḥ
