tais tair jīvopahārair iha kuhara-śilāsaṃśrayām arcayitvā
tad-brahmāṇḍam iha kvacit kvacid api kṣoṇī kvacin nīradās
te dvīpāntara-śālino jaladhayaḥ kvāpi kvacit bhūbhṛtaḥ
āścaryaṃ gaganasya ko 'pi mahimā sarvair amībhiḥ sthitair
dūre pūraṇam asya śūnyam iti yan-nāmāpi nācchāditam
taṃ pannagas tam api tat-sahitaṃ payodhiḥ
satyaṃ na kaścid avadhir mahatāṃ mahimnaḥ
kiṃ brūmo jaladheḥ śriyaṃ sa hi khalu śrī-janma-bhūmiḥ svayaṃ
vācyaḥ kiṃ mahimāpi yasya hi nava-dvīpaṃ mahīti śrutiḥ
tyāgaḥ ko 'pi sa tasya bibhrati jaganty asyārthino 'py ambudāḥ
śakteḥ kaiva kathāpi yasya bhavati kṣobheṇa kalpāntaram
etasmāj jaladher jalasya kaṇikāḥ kāścid gṛhītvā tataḥ
prāpyaikāṃ jala-mānuṣīṃ tri-bhuvane śrīmān abhūd acyutaḥ
āścaryaṃ vaḍavānalaḥ sa bhagavān āścaryam ambhonidhir
ekasyāśraya-ghasmarasya pibatas tṛptir na jātā jalair
anyasyāpi mahātmano na vapuṣi svalpo 'pi toya-vyayaḥ
nipīto yenāyaṃ taṭam adhivasaty asya sa munir
dadhāno 'ntardāhaṃ sraja iva sa cāurvo 'sti dahanaḥ
tathā sarvasvārthe bahu-vimathito yena sa hariḥ
svapity aṅke śrīmān ahaha mahimā ko 'pi jaladheḥ
anyaḥ ko 'pi sa kumbha-saṃbhava-muner āstāṃ śikhī jāṭharo
paścād pt pārśvam apūritāntara-viyad yatra svanan bhrāmyati
sīmā sarva-mahādbhuteṣu sa tathā vārāṃ patiḥ pīyate
pītaḥ so 'pi na pūritaṃ ca jaṭharaṃ tasmai namo 'gastaye
sūryād ṛte na tad udeti na cāstam eti
utpattir jamadagnitaḥ sa bhagavān devaḥ pinākī gurus
śauryaṃ yac ca na tad-girāṃ pathi nanu vyaktaṃ hi tat karmabhiḥ
satyaṃ brahma-tapo-nidher bhagavataḥ kiṃ nāma lokāntaram
ito vasati keśavaḥ puram itaś ca tad-vidviṣāṃ
aho vitatam ūrjitaṃ bharasahaṃ ca sindhor vapuḥ
tat tāvad eva śaśinaḥ sphuritaṃ mahīyo
apatyāni prāyo daśa daśa varāhī janayati
kṣamābhāre dhuryaḥ sa punar iha nāsīn na bhavitā
teṣāṃ tṛṣaḥ pariṇamanti na yatra tatra
kiṃ brūmo harim asya viśvam udare kiṃ vā phaṇāṃ bhoginaḥ
śete yatra hariḥ svayaṃ jalanidheḥ so 'py ekadeśe sthitaḥ
vistāro yadi nedṛśo na yadi tad-gāmbhīryam ambhonidher
na syād vā yadi sarva-sattva-viṣayas tādṛg-kṛpānugrahaḥ
antaḥ prajvalatā payāṃsi dahatā jvālāvalīr muñcatā
ke na syur vaḍavānalena balinā bhasmāvaśeṣīkṛtāḥ
uddīptāgnir asau munir vijayate yasyodare jīryataḥ
pāthoder avaśiṣṭam ambu katham apy udgīrṇam anto 'rṇavam
kiṃ cāsmāj jaṭharānalād iva navas tat-kālavānti-kramād
niryātaḥ sa puno yamāya payasām antargato vāḍavaḥ
saṃvāsānte vrajati jalade vaikṛtas tābhir eva
yaḥ sāmudrīr aviratam imās tejasi sve juhoti
asanto nābhyarthyāḥ suhṛd api na yācyas tanu-dhanaḥ
priyā vṛttir nyāyyā caritam asubhaṅge 'py amalinam
vipady uccaiḥ stheyaṃ padam anuvidheyaṃ ca mahatāṃ
puro vā paścād vā tad idam aviparyāsita-rasaṃ
adyaiva vā maraṇam astu yugāntare vā
nyāyyāt pathaḥ pravicalanti padaṃ na dhīrāḥ
yadā kiṃcij-jño 'haṃ gaja iva madāndhaḥ samabhavaṃ
tadā sarvajño 'smīty abhavad avaliptaṃ mama manaḥ
tadā mūrkho 'smīti jvara iva mado me vyapagataḥ
ekaḥ kurute cchidraṃ guṇavān anyaḥ prapūrayati //
santaḥ svayaṃ yadi namanti namanti kāmam
bhajyanta eva śatadhā na punar namanti
khyātas tvaṃ vibhavair yaśāṃsi kavayo dikṣu pratanvanti naḥ
itthaṃ mānada nātidūram ubhayor apy āvayor antaraṃ
yady asmāsu parāṅmukho 'si vayam apy ekāntato niḥspṛhāḥ
udanvacchinnā bhūḥ sa ca nidhirapāṃ yojana-śataṃ
satāṃ prajñonmeṣaḥ punar ayam asīmā vijayate
sāphalyam asti sutarām idam eva teṣāṃ
madhuram aśaṭhaṃ ca vākyaṃ kenāpy upadiṣṭam āryāṇām //
krūro 'pi prakṛtaṃ vihāya malinām ālambate bhadratām
yat tṛṣṇā-glapito 'pi necchati janaḥ pātuṃ tad eva kṣaṇād
ujjhaty ambudharodara-sthitam apāṃ patyuḥ payaḥ kṣāratām
sujanāḥ paruṣābhidhāyino yadi kaḥ syād aparo 'pi mañju-vāk /
yadi candra-karāḥ sa-vahnayo nanu jāyeta sudhā kṛto 'nyataḥ //
ye dīneṣu kṛpālavaḥ spṛśati yān alpo 'pi na śrīmadaḥ
śrāntā ye ca paropakāra-karaṇe hṛṣyanti ye yācitāḥ
ye prāpte vyasane 'py anākula-dhiyaḥ saṃpatsu naivonnatāḥ
prāpte naiva parāṅ-mukhāḥ praṇayini prāṇopayogair api
dhig dhātrā kṛpaṇena yena na kṛtāḥ kalpānta-dīrghāyuṣaḥ
mukhe satyā vāṇī śrutam anavagītaṃ śravaṇayoḥ
hṛdi svacchā vṛttir vijayi-bhujayor vīryam atulaṃ
vināpy aiśvaryeṇa sphurati mahatāṃ maṇḍanam idam
ā paritoṣād viduṣāṃ na sādhu manye prayoga-vijñānam /
balavad api śikṣitānām ātmany apratyayaṃ cetaḥ //
purāṇam ity eva na sādhu sarvaṃ
na cāpi kāvyaṃ navam ity avadyam
bhavatām ayaṃ viḍambo yad idaṃ chidrair visūtrayatu //
yan netrais tribhir īkṣate na giriśo nāṣṭābhir apy abja-bhūḥ
sakndo dvādaśabhis na vā na maghavā cakṣuḥ-sahasreṇa vā
saṃbhūyāpi jagat-trayasya nayanair draṣṭuṃ na yat śakyate
satatam asatyād bibhyati mā bhaiṣīr iti vadanti bhīteṣu /
yady api daivāt sneho naśyati sādhos tathāpi sattveṣu /
atimaline kartavye bhavati khalānām atīva nipuṇā dhīḥ /
timire hi kauśikānāṃ rūpaṃ pratipadyante dṛṣṭiḥ //
itthaṃ tad bhuvi nāsti yatra vidhinā nopāya-cintā kṛtā
sūtraṃ kiṃcid apūrvam eva jaṭharād utpādya sadyaḥ svayaṃ
ākhubhyaḥ kiṃ khalair jñātaṃ khalebhyaḥ kim athākhubhiḥ /
anyad pt para-gṛhotkhātāt karma yeṣāṃ na vidyate //
bālaḥ pāyasa-dagdho dadhy api phūtkṛtya bhakṣayati //
khalaḥ kiṃcid vākyaṃ racayati ca vistārayati ca
muneḥgr gaṇḍūṣe 'bdhiḥ sthita iti kuto 'yaṃ kalakalaḥ
bhramayati mano no jānīmaḥ kim atra vidhāsyati
yaṃ daṃṣṭrayā spṛśati taṃ kila hanti sarpaḥ
karṇe paraṃ spṛśati hanty aparaṃ sa-mūlam
pariśuddhām api vṛttiṃ samāśrito durjanaḥ parān vyathate /
kṣipre roṣiṇi śarma-śoṣiṇe vinā hetuṃ jagat-ploṣiṇi
jāḍyaṃ hrīmati gaṇyate vrata-rucau dambhaḥ śucau kaitavaṃ
tejasviny avaliptatā mukharatā vaktary aśaktiḥ sthire
tat ko nāma bhaved guṇaḥ sa guṇināṃ yo durjane nāṅkitaḥ
vandyān nindati duḥkhitān upahasaty ābādhate bāndhavān
śūrān dveṣṭi dhana-cyutān paribhavaty ājñāpayaty āśritān
brūte śīghram avācyam ujjhita-guṇo gṛhṇāti doṣān khalaḥ
karuṇā-dravam eva durjanaḥ sutarāṃ sat-puruṣaṃ prabādhate /
mṛdukaṃ hi bhinatti kaṇṭakaḥ kaṭhine kuṇṭhaka iva jāyate //
itīmaṃ vyāmohaṃ parihara vicitrāḥ śṛṇu kathā
upakāriṇi śuddha-matau vārjane yaḥ samācarati pāpam /
taṃ janam asatya-saṃdhaṃ bhagavati vasudhe kathaṃ vahasi //
akalita-nija-para-rūpaḥ svakam api doṣaṃ para-sthitaṃ vetti /
nāvāsthitas taṭasthān acalān api vicalitān manute //
sarvatra mukhara-capalāḥ prabhavanti na loka-saṃmatā guṇinaḥ /
tiṣṭhanti vāri-rāśeḥur upari taraṅgās tale maṇayaḥ //
guṇa-kaṇikān api sujanaḥ śaśilekhām iva śivaḥ śirasi kurute /
candra iva padma-lakṣmīṃ na kṣamate para-guṇaṃ piśunaḥ //
antar-manā asādhur gaṇayati na tad-āyuṣo madhye //
divasān tān abhinandati bahu-manute teṣu janmano lābham /
parāṃ vrajati vikriyāṃ na hi bhayaṃ tataḥ paśyati
vinīta iva nīcakaiś carati tatra śāntoddhavaḥ
nītaṃ ceto na ca dhavalitaṃ helayā nārpitaṃ ca
ete snigdhatamā iti mā mā kṣudreṣu kuruta viśvāsam /
hetor vinopakārī yadi nāma śateṣu kaścid ekaḥ syāt /
sātatyaṃ bata mudriteva jatunā nīteva mūrchāṃ viṣaiḥ
baddhevātanu-rajjubhiḥ para-guṇān vaktuṃ na śaktā satī
kunthann utthāya pānthaḥ pathi paruṣa-marun-mūrcchyamānaḥ prayāti
pānthas taptvā prasuptaḥ pratata-tanu-tṛṇe dhāmani grāma-devyāḥ
vāte vāti prakamaṃ hima-kaṇini kaṇan koṇataḥ koṇam eti
yāvan nirvāhayati bhavatī yena vā kenacid vā
kūṣmāṇḍī ca prabhavati tadā bhūbhujaḥ ke vayaṃ ke
kṣut-kṣāmāḥ śiśavaḥ śavā iva tanur mandādaro bāndhavo
liptā jarjara-karkarī-jala-lavair no māṃ tathā bādhate
kupyantī prativeśinī pratidinaṃ sūcīṃ yathā yācitā
pracchanne ca vadhūr vibhāga-kuśalā madhye sthitā gehinī
tasminn eva gṛhodare rasavatī tatraiva sā kaṇḍanī
tatropaskaraṇāni tatra śiśavas tatraiva vāsaḥ svayam
etat soḍhavato 'pi duḥstha-gṛhiṇaḥ kiṃ brūmahe durdaśām
adya śvo vijaniṣyamāṇa-gṛhiṇī tatraiva yat kunthati
śvo vā kathaṃ nu bhaviteti vicintayantī
saktūñ śocati saṃplutān pratikaroty ākrandato bālakān
dattvā mūrdhani śīrṇaṃ śūrpa-śakalaṃ jīrṇe gṛhe vyākulā
kiṃ tad yan na karoti duḥstha-gṛhiṇī deve bhṛśaṃ varṣati
mā rodīś ciram ehi vatsa viphalaṃ dṛṣṭvādya putrān imān
āyāto bhavato 'pi dāsyati pitā graiveyakaṃ vāsasī
tat saṃyācya kutaścid īśvara-gṛhād ānīyamānaṃ śanaiḥ
adhvany eva hi bindubhir vigalitaṃ śrāṇe śarāvodare
mātar dharma-pare dayāṃ kuru mayi śrānte ca vaideśike
kasyacit (Svsu.ā. 2416, ant spd śā.pa. 580 ravidattasya, Smvsū.mu. 96.3 raviguptasya, Skmsa.u.ka. 1341 śatānandasya)
lagnaḥ śṛṅga-yuge gṛhī satanayo vṛddhau gurū pārśvayoḥ
pucchāgre gṛhiṇī khureṣu śiśavo lagnā vadhūḥ kambale
dhātas trapā yadi na kiṃ na pariśramo 'pi
śrīphalaṃ yan na tad dīrgham iti tāvad vyavasthitam /
tatraikānta-dhṛtir yasya manyate mugdha eva saḥ //
kṛpaṇasya kṛpāṇasya ca kevalam ākārato bhedaḥ //
na khalu vetsi navas tvam ihāgataḥ
tārābhāḥ phaṇa-cakravāla-maṇayo na syur yadi dyotino
yair evonnatim āpnuvanti guṇinas tair eva yānty āpadam
kṛtvākhur vivaraṃ svayaṃ nipatito naktaṃ mukhe bhoginaḥ
tṛptas tat-piśitena satvaram asau tenaiva yātaḥ pathā
svasthās tiṣṭhata daivam eva jagataḥ śāntau kṣaye cākulam
teṣām asṛk pibati saiva mahī hatānāṃ
ravir yāty evāntaṃ pratidinam apārasya nabhasaḥ
paulastyaḥ katham anya-dāra-haraṇe doṣaṃ na vijñātavān
akṣāṇāṃ ca yudhiṣṭhireṇa mahatā jñāto na doṣaḥ kathaṃ
akārye tathyo vā bhavati vitathaḥ kāmam athavā
tathāpy uccair dhāmnāṃ harati mahimānaṃ jana-ravaḥ
raves tādṛk tejo na hi bhavati kanyāṃ gata iti
śaktā hi kūpam api śoṣayituṃ na kumbhāḥ
chāyām ātapa-vairiṇīm anusaran bilvasya mūlaṃ gataḥ
tatrāpy āśu kadācid eva patatā bilvena bhagnaṃ śiraḥ
prāyo gacchati yatra bhāgya-rahitas tatrāpadāṃ bhājanam
praśīrṇāṅgo bhṛṅgī vasu ca vṛṣa eko bahu-vayāḥ
vidhau vakre mūrdhni sthitavati vayaṃ ke punar amī
prahṛṣṭa-premāṇāṃ sa hi sahaja eṣām udayate
puṃsaḥ kulaṃ na hi nimittam udāttatāyāḥ
tṛṣārtaḥ śāraṅgo viramati na khinne 'pi vapuṣi
ajānānas tattvaṃ na sa mṛgayate 'nyāṃ ca sarasīm
abhūmau pratyāśā na hi phalati vighnaṃ ca kurute
kiṃ kūrmasya bhara-vyathā na vapuṣi kṣmāṃ na kṣipaty eṣa yat
kiṃ vā nāsti pariśramo dina-karasyāste na yan niścalaḥ
kiṃ tv aṅgīkṛtam utsṛjan kṛpaṇavad ślāghyo jano lajjate
nirvyūḍhiḥ pratipanna-vastuṣu satām ekaṃ batāho vratam
saṅgaḥ satām abhijanaś ca na hetur atra
svāṃ kālatāṃ tyajati jātu na kālakūṭaḥ
gaur ekaḥ sa ca lāṅgale 'py akuśalas tan-mātra-sāraṃ dhanam
śarvasyety avagamya yāti vimukhī ratnālayaṃ jāhnavī
kaṣṭaṃ durgatikasya jīvitam aho dārair api tyajyate
vāme vidhau vada kathaṃ vyasanasya śāntiḥ
khanati na khuraiḥ kṣoṇī-pṛṣṭhaṃ na nardati sādaraṃ
prakṛti-puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvaivāgre na kupyati gām api
vahati tu dhuraṃ dhuryo dhairyād anuddhata-kandharo
jagati kṛtinaḥ kāryaudāryād pt parān atiśerate
śiraḥ śārvaṃ svargād pt paśupati-śirastaḥ kṣiti-bhṛtaṃ
mahīdhrād uttuṅgād avani-talam asmāc ca jaladhim
adho 'dho gaṅgāvad vayam upagatā dūram athavā
na daśati punas tārāśaṅkī divāpi sitotpalaṃ
asthānābhiniveśī prāyo jaḍa eva bhavati no vidvān /
nirguṇam apy anuraktaṃ prāyo na samāśritaṃ jahati santaḥ /
avikāriṇam api sajjanam aniśam anāryaḥ prabādhate 'tyartham /
kamalinyā kim apakṛtaṃ himasya yas tāṃ sadā dahati //
bhayaṃ yad dhanur īśvarasya śiśinā yaj jāmadagnyo hatas
tyaktā yena guror girā vasumatī baddho yad ambhonidhiḥ
daivaṃ varṇaya yena so 'pi sahasā nītaḥ kathā-śeṣatām
śaśinam uditaṃ lekhā-mātraṃ namanti na cetaraṃ
gagana-saritaṃ dhatte mūrdhnā haro na nagātmajām
upaśama-phalād vidyā-bījād pt phalaṃ dhanam icchatāṃ
bhavati viphalaḥ prārambho yat tad atra kim adbhutam
niyata-viṣayāḥ sarve bhāvā na yānti hi vikriyāṃ
janayitum alaṃ śāler bījaṃ na jātu javāṅkuram
ghanair muktā dhārāḥ sapadi payasas tān prati muhuḥ
khagānāṃ ke meghāḥ ka iha vihagā vā jala-mucām
payas tejo vāyur gaganam avanir viśvam api vā
svayaṃ viṣṇus tasya tridaśa-jayinaḥ kiṃ na sukaram
chalān nīto 'dhastād balir aṇuka-rūpeṇa tad api
svabhāvāc cakrī yaḥ praguṇam api cakreṇa sṛjati
kiṃ nojjvalaḥ kim u kalāḥ sakalā na dhatte
datte na kiṃ nayanayor mudam unmayūkhaḥ
lūnās tilās tad-anu śoṣam upāgatās te
śoṣād hi śuddhim atha tāpam upetavantaḥ
dugdha mugdham asti yas tvayā dhṛtaḥ sneha eṣa vipad-eka-kāraṇam /
yat-kṛte tvam apavāsitaṃ punaś chinnam unmathitam agni-sātkṛtam //
mūrdhenduḥ parameśvareṇa vidhṛto vakro jaḍātmā kṣayī
nandī dvāri bahiṣkṛto guṇanidhiḥ kaṣṭaṃ kim atrocyatāṃ
kākutsthasya daśānano na kṛtavān dārāpahāraṃ yadi
kvāmbhodhiḥ kva ca setubandha-ghaṭanā kvottīrya laṅkājayaḥ
pārthasyāpi parābhavaṃ yadi ripuḥnr nādāt kva tādṛk tapo
nīyante ripubhiḥ samunnati-padaṃ prāyaḥ paraṃ māninaḥ
śambūkāḥ kila nirgatār jalanidhes tīreṣu dāvāgninā
dahyante maṇayo vaṇik-kara-talair āyānti rājñāṃ śiraḥ
sthāna-pracyutir alpakasya vipade santas tu deśāntaraṃ
yānto yānti sadā samarpita-guṇāḥ ślāghyāḥ parām unnatim
apetāḥ śatrubhyo vayam iti viṣādo 'yam aphalaḥ
pratīkāras tv eṣām aniśam anusaṃdhātum ucitaḥ
jaghānainaṃ paścān na kim anila-sūnuḥ priya-sakhaḥ
gṛhṇāti yuktam itarac ca jahāti dhīmān
graha-parikavalita-tanur api ravir iha bodhayati padma-ṣaṇḍāni /
guṇaṃ vā doṣaṃ vā gaṇayati na dāna-vyasanitā
dig-dantinaḥ sva-kara-puṣkara-lekhanībhir gaṇḍa-sthalān madamasiṃ muhur ādadānāḥ /
na janayasi kaṃsa-harṣaṃ vahasi śarīraṃ yaśodayā juṣṭam /
tyajasi na satyonmukhatām iti satyaṃ vāsudevo 'si //
na lopo varṇānāṃ na khalu parataḥ pratyaya-vidhir
vikāro nāsty eva kvacid api na bhagnāḥ prakṛtayaḥ
guṇo vā vṛddhir vā satatam upakārāya jagatāṃ
muner dākṣī-putrād api tava samarthaḥ pada-vidhiḥ
kiṃ tu śrotra-kaṭu kvaṇanti madhupās tat-pārijāta-srajām
yasya dvīpaṃ dharitrī sa ca jaladhir abhūd yasya gaṇḍūṣa-toyaṃ
tasyāścaryaika-mūrter api nabhasi vapur yatra durlakṣyam āsīt
tat-pītaṃ tvad-yaśobhis tribhuvanam abhajaṃs tāni viśrāma-hetos
tac cāntaḥ kaiṭabhāreḥ sa ca tava hṛdaye vandanīyas tvam ekaḥ
tvaṃ cen nātha kalā-nidhiḥ śaśadharas tat toyanāthā vayaṃ
maryādā-nidhir ambhasāṃ patir atha tvaṃ ced vayaṃ vāridāḥ
sarvāśā-paripūrako jaladharas tvaṃ ced vayaṃ bhūruhaḥ
san-mārga-sthiti-sundaras tvam iti cec chākhī vayaṃ cādhvagāḥ
vyathayati mantrākṣaram iva nāma tavārīn vanecarair gītam //
prāg āsīn naranātha saṃprati punas teṣāṃ tavānugrahāt
nātha tvām anuyāce prasīda vijahīhi saṃgarārambham /
unnati-bhājaḥ saṃprati santi vipakṣāḥ paraṃ girayaḥ //
devaḥ sva-stutir astu nāma hṛdi naḥ sarve vasanty āgamās
tīrthaṃ na kvacid īdṛg atra bhavati tvat-khaḍga-dhārā yathā
yām ekaḥ sva-śarīra-śuddhi-rasiko mūrdhnā pratīcchan ripur
dvaividhyād anu pañcatāṃ tad anu ca traidaśyam āpa kṣaṇāt
tavyaṃ ḍhaukitam eva tubhyam adhunā jāto 'smi niṣkiṃcanaḥ
prātas tapta-kuṭhāram eṣa vahate deva tvad-agre 'mbudhiḥ
svāṃ mūrtiṃ dayitām ivātirasikāṃ tvad-vidviṣaḥ śerate
sāmānyair api jantubhiḥ karatalair niḥśaṅkam āliṅgitāḥ
nirlagnāḥ kvacid ekatām upagatā baddhāḥ kvacin mocitāḥ
akṣāṇām iva śārayaḥ pratigṛhaṃ bhrāntās tavāri-striyaḥ
bhekaṃ mūrdhni nigṛhya kajjala-rajaḥ-śyāmaṃ bhujaṅgaṃ sthitam
paryaṅkaḥ śithilīkṛto na bhavatā siṃhāsanān notthitaṃ
na krodhānala-dhūma-rājir iva ca bhrū-vallir ullāsitā
rājñāṃ tvac-caraṇāravindam atha ca śrīcandra puṣpanty amūś
dvāraṃ khaḍgibhir āvṛtaṃ bahir api prasivnna-gaṇḍair gajair
antaḥ kañcukibhiḥ sphūran maṇidharair adhyāsitā bhūmayaḥ
ākrāntaṃ mahiṣībhir eva śayanaṃ tvad-vidviṣāṃ mandire
vijaya-pālasya | (Skmsa.u.ka. 1596, yogeśvarasya; Svsu.ā. 2569, Smvsū.mu. 97.78, Kuval, p. 161)
atyuktau yadi na prakupyasi mṛṣā-vādaṃ na cen manyase
tad brūmo 'dbhuta-kīrtaneṣu rasanā keṣāṃ na kaṇḍūyate
kodaṇḍena śarāḥ śarai ripuśiras tenāpi bhū-maṇḍalaṃ
tena tvaṃ bhavatā ca kīrtir anaghā kīrtyā ca loka-trayam
tava jyā-nirghoṣaṃ nṛpatir iha ko nāma sahate
yam uccair ākarṇya tridaśa-patir apy āhava-bhiyā
hriyā pārśvaṃ paśyan nibhṛta-nibhṛtaṃ muñcati dhanuḥ
te kaupīna-dhanās ta eva hi paraṃ dhātrī-phalaṃ bhuñjate
teṣāṃ dvāri nadanti vāji-nivahās tair eva labdhā kṣitiḥ
tair etat samalaṃkṛtaṃ nija-kulaṃ kiṃ vā bahu brūmahe
ye dṛṣṭāḥ parameśvareṇa bhavatā tuṣṭena ruṣṭena vā
vatse mādhavi tāta campaka śiśo mākanda konti priye
hā mātar madayanti hā kuravaka bhrātaḥ khasar mālati
ity evaṃ ripu-mandireṣu bhavataḥ śṛṇvanti naktaṃcarā
vajrin vajram idaṃ jahīhi bhagavan īśa triśūlena kiṃ
viṣṇo tvaṃ ca vimuñca cakram amarāḥ sarve tyajantv āyudham
pṛthur asi guṇaiḥ kīrtyā rāmo nalo bharato bhavān
mahati samare śatrughnas tvaṃ sadaiva yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
katham asi na māndhātā deva triloka-vidhāyy api
yadi tad aguṇaṃ kaṇṭhe mā dhās tathorasi mā kṛthā
navam iti kiyat karṇe dhehi kṣaṇaṃ phalatu śramaḥ
gṛhṇānaiḥ kacam ālikhadbhir adharaṃ vidrāvayadbhiḥ kucau
dhik kaṣṭaṃ viṭapair viṭair iva vane kiṃ nāma nāceṣṭitam
kurvanti ye dinakarasya karās ta eva
śoṣe kathaṃ pratihatā iti me vitarkaḥ
śeṣaṃ kleśayituṃ diśaḥ sthagayituṃ peṣṭuṃ dharitrī-bhṛtaḥ
sindhūn dhūli-bhareṇa kardamayituṃ tair eva roddhuṃ nabhaḥ
nāsīre ca muhur muhuś calacalety ālāpa-kolāhalān
kartuṃ nātha varuthinīyam avanīṃ jetuṃ punas tvad-bhujau
deva tvat-sainya-bhārād avanim avanatāṃ dhartum uttabdha-dehaḥ
dṛṣṭaḥ prāroha-śālī vaṭa iva phalito rakta-mūrdhanya-ratnaḥ
ambhaḥ kardamatām upaiti sahasā paṅka-dravaḥ pāṃśutāṃ
nimnatvaṃ girayaḥ samaṃ viṣamatāṃ śūnyaṃ jana-sthānakaṃ
niryāte tvayi rājya-pāla bhavati tyakta-svabhāvaṃ jagat
deva tvaṃ kila kuntala-graha-ruciḥ kāñcīm apāsārayan
kṣiptaḥ kṣipta-kara-tataḥ prahaṇanaṃ prārabdham aṅgeṣv api
gṛhṇītāhnāya sarve bhuvi bhuvana-bhujaś cāmaraṃ vā diśo vā
naivaṃ ced vas tadānīṃ pradhana-dhṛta-dhanur mukta-rāvarṇa-viddhaṃ
gṛdhrā mūrdhānam ūrdhvaṃ nabhasi rabhasino lāghavenoddharanti
ataḥ śaṅkara evāsi sadā skandaḥ paraṃ na te //
ābālyādhigamān mayaiva gamitaḥ koṭiṃ parām unnater
yātas tīra-tapo-vanāni bhavato vṛddho guṇānāṃ gaṇaḥ
carati vimuktāhāraṃ vratam iva bhavato ripu-strīṇām //
mārge pallavitaṃ puraṃ praviśataḥ śākhā-śatair udgatam
prātar bhāvini darśane mukulitaṃ dṛṣṭe tu deva tvayi
protphullaṃ phalitaṃ ca saṃprati manorājya-drumeṇādya me
jāne vikrama-vardhana tvayi dhanaṃ viśrāṇayaty arthināṃ
bhāvī śoṇa ivopalair upacito ratnair agādho 'mbudhiḥ
tat paśyāmi ca rohaṇo maṇi-bharair ādhmāya-mānodaraḥ
ekas tridhā hṛdi sadā vasasi sma citraṃ
yo vidviṣāṃ ca viduṣāṃ ca mṛgīdṛśāṃ ca
tāpaṃ ca saṃmada-rasaṃ ca ratiṃ ca tanvan
śauryoṣmaṇā ca vinayena ca līlayā ca
deva tvām aham arthaye ciram asau varṣāgamo nirgatas
tīrthaṃ tīrtham itas tato vicarituṃ ceto 'dhunā dhāvati
karṇānte maśakaḥ kim apy ari-vadhū-sārthasya te jalpati
padmāyāḥ śvasitānilāni ca śarat-kālasya tac ca sphuṭaṃ
vyomādāya vinirmito 'si vidhinā kāmboja tubhyaṃ namaḥ
kṣiptaḥ kṣīra-gṛhe na dugdha-jaladhiḥ koṣe na hemācalo
no vā dikkariṇaḥ kvaṇan madhulihaḥ paryāya-paryāṇana
krīḍāyāṃ viniyojitā vada kṛtaṃ kiṃ kiṃ tvayā dig-jaye
dīrghāyuḥ kutavāsaraṃ pratidiśaṃ vyasto ravir tāmyati
ye tṛṣṇārtair adhikam aniśaṃ bhujyamānāḥ prasannāḥ
antarbhūtār jhaṭiti guṇino yatra pūrṇā bhavanti
namrī-bhūtaiḥ phalam abhinavaṃ prāpyate yady avaśyaṃ
tat kiṃ kūpāḥ sukṛta-ghaṭitās tvādṛśā vā pumāṃsaḥ
bhrāntaṃ yena caturbhir eva caraṇaiḥ satyābhidhāne yuge
tretāyāṃ tribhir aṅghribhiḥ katham api dvābhyāṃ tato dvāpare
na syās tvaṃ yadi deva paṅgula-guṅdaḥ kāle kalāv utkale
so 'yaṃ paṅgur avasthitaika-caraṇo dharmaḥ kathaṃ bhrāmyati
tvaṃ dharma-bhūs tvam iha saṃgara-mūrdhni bhīmaḥ
tulyas tvayā yadi paraṃ sahadeva eva
duḥśāsanas tava punar nanu ko 'pi śatruḥ
kūrmaḥ pādo 'tra yaṣṭir bhujaga-patir asau bhājanaṃ bhūta-dhātrī
antaḥ-khedam ivodvahan yad aniśaṃ ratnākaro ghūrṇate
yac ca dhyānam ivāsthito na kanaka-kṣoṇī-dharaḥ syandate
jāne dāna-vilāsa dāna-rabhasaṃ śauryaṃ ca te śuśruvān
mayā tāvad dṛṣṭo na khalu kali-kandarpa-nṛpater
guṇais tulyaḥ ko 'pi kvacid api kim aśrāvi bhavatā
kvacin na krodhas te svapada-jita-devas tvam udadher
abhinno 'pi svāmin na kim asi samudraḥ sva-viṣaye
ānandāśru-jalaṃ pibanti śakunā niḥśaṅkam aṅke sthitāḥ
kasyacit | (VaiS 196, Ss 1.5, Spdśā.pa. 4155, Smvsū.mu. 126.9, Skmsa.u.ka. 2288, satyabodhasya)
āsvādya svayam eva vacmi mahatīḥmr marma-cchido vedanāḥ
mā bhūt kasyacid apy ayaṃ paribhavo yāñcheti saṃsāriṇaḥ
mukhāni prekṣyante dhig idam atiduṣpūram udaram
jātir yātu rasātalaṃ guṇa-gaṇas tasyāpy adho gacchatu
śīlaṃ śaila-taṭāt patāv abhijanaḥ saṃdahyatāṃ vahninā
śaurye vairiṇi vajram āśu nipatatv artho 'stu naḥ kevalaṃ
yenaikena vinā guṇās tṛṇa-lava-prāyāḥ samastā ime
niṣkandāḥ kim u kandarodara-bhuvaḥ kṣīṇās tarūṇāṃ tvacaḥ
pratyutthānam itas tataḥ pratidinaṃ kurvadbhīr udgītibhir
yad dhārārpita-dṛṣṭibhiḥ kṣiti-bhujāṃ vidvadbhir apy āsyate
yad ete sādhūnām upari vimukhāḥ santi dhaninoaḥ
ataḥ khedo nāsmin aparam anukampaiva bhavati
no baddhaṃ śarad-indu-dhāma-dhavalaṃ pāṇau muhuḥ kaṅkaṇaṃ
nītaṃ naiva yaśaḥ surendra-bhavanaṃ śastreṇa śāstreṇa vā
kālo jīrṇa-maṭheṣu dhṛṣṭa-piśunaiś chātraiḥ saha preritaḥ
kṛtaka-caritair bhartuś ceto na vañcayituṃ kṣamāḥ
priyam api vaco mithyā vaktuṃ jaḍair na ca śikṣitaṃ
ka iva hi guṇo yo 'smān kuryān nareśvara-vallabhān
nigṛhyāntar duḥkhaṃ hasitam api śūnyena manasā
tvam āśe moghāśe kim aparam ato nartayasi mām
mayāptaṃ rāmatvaṃ kuśala-vasutā na tv adhigatā
abhinandasya | (Svsu.ā. 3264, kasyacit; Sdsā.da. under 4.17; Smvsū.mu. 127.5, bhaṭṭa-vācaspateḥ; Skmsa.u.ka. 2265, śūlapāṇeḥ)
yā tvaṃ svayam akṛtajñaṃ jaḍam akulīnaṃ na saṃspṛśati //
bhadre vāṇi vidhehi tāvad amalāṃ varṇānupūrvīṃ mukhe
cetaḥ svāsthyam upehi gaccha gurute yatra sthitā māninaḥ
lajje tiṣṭha parāṅ-mukhī kṣaṇam itas tṛṣṇu puraḥ sthīyatāṃ
pāpo yāvad ahaṃ bravīmi dhanine dehīti dīnaṃ vacaḥ
api jñātvā śāstraṃ kaṭakam aṭato jīryati vapus
tato re pāṇḍityaṃ yad iha na sukhaṃ no 'pi ca tapaḥ
virama varaṃ bhramarahite na phalasi bhuktiṃ ca muktiṃ ca //
ke nāma na pratipadaṃ puruṣāḥ skhalanti
svalpa-draviṇa-kaṇā vayam amī ca guṇino daridrati sahasram /
dāna-vyasana-lavo hṛdi dhig dhātaḥ kiṃ viḍambayasi //
vidyāvān api janmavān api tathā yukto 'pi cānyair guṇair
yan nāpnoti manaḥ samīhita-phalaṃ daivasya sā vācyatā
etāvat tu hṛdi vyathāṃ vitanute yat-prāktanaiḥ karmabhir
lakṣmīṃ prāpya jaḍo 'py asādhur api ca svāṃ yogyatāṃ manyate
īśvara-gṛham idam atra hi viṣaṃ ca vṛṣabhaś ca bhasma cādriyate /
yas tu na viṣaṃ na vṛṣabho na bhasma tasyātra kā gaṇanā //
ko bhṛṅgīva na śuṣyati vāñcha na phalam īśvarād aguṇāt //
hṛt-paṭṭake yad yad ahaṃ likhāmi tat tad vidhir lumpati sāvadhānaḥ /
bhūyo vilopān masṛṇe tv idānīṃ rekhāpi nodeti manorathasya //
kuryān na kiṃ dhanavataḥ svajanasya vārtā
kiṃ tat-kriyā nayanayor na dhṛtiṃ vidadhyāt
mām eṣa yācitum upāgata ity asatya
saṃbhāvanā-vikalam asya na cen manaḥ syāt
tāvat kathaṃ kathaya yāsi gṛhaṃ parasya
svaṃ varṇayasy atha kathaṃ kula-putra mānī
sārasavattā vihatā na bakā vilasanti carati no kaṅkaḥ /

subandhoḥ
(Vāsavadattā vāsavadattā 10 ṇB in a also divide sā rasavattā !) --
chittvā pāśam apāsya kūṭa-racanāṃ bhittvā balād vāgurāṃ
kūpāntaḥ-patitaḥ karotu viguṇe kiṃ vā vidhau pauruṣam
kāmaṃ vaneṣu hariṇās tṛṇena jīvanty ayatna-sulabhena /
vidadhati dhaniṣu na daintyaṃ te kila paśavo vayaṃ sudhiyaḥ //
vasumati vasumati bandhau dhana-lava-lobhena ye niṣīdanti /
tān ca tṛṇān iva dadhatī kalayasi vada gauravaṃ kasya //
anāryair asmābhiḥ param iyam apūrvaiva racanā
kalaṅko ratnaṃ tu pratiphaṇam anarghaṃ viṣa-bhṛtām
pratyāsanna-bhayo na vetti vibhavaṃ svaṃ jīvitaṃ kāṅkṣati
uttīrṇas tu tato dhanārtham aparāṃ bhūyo viśaty āpadaṃ
prāṇānāṃ ca dhanasya cāyam adhiyām anyonya-hetuḥ paṇaḥ
prāṇair apy upakurvate vyasaninas te sādhavo dūrataḥ
cakṣuḥ saṃhara bāṣpa-vegam adhunā kasyāgrato rudyate
atikrāntaṃ tais taiḥ kavibhir abhinandādibhir api
idānīṃ vāk tūṣṇīṃ bhava kim u mudhaiva pralapasi
kva pūjā-saṃbhāraḥ kva ca tava guṇollāsa-rabhasaḥ
pada-bhraṣṭā devī sarid api surāṇāṃ bhagavatī
dvi-jihvād anyeṣāṃ kva nanu guṇinām īśvara-juṣāṃ
tvayā dṛṣṭo bhogaḥ kim iha viphalaṃ kliśyasi manaḥ
gaccha trape virama dhairya dhiyaḥ kim atra
dainyaṃ yad ādiśati tad vayam ācarāmaḥ
vidhir vāmārambhas tad api ca mano vāñchati sukham
durvāso malināṅga-yaṣṭir abalā dṛṣṭo janaḥ sve gṛhe
nīcāt karṇa-kaṭu śrutaṃ dhanam adād āruḍha-garvaṃ vacaḥ
anyo mandiram āgataḥ paricayād aprāpta-kāmo gataḥ
śiro raudraṃ kvāheḥ sphurad-uru-mayūkhaḥ kva ca maṇiḥ
kaliḥ kvāyaṃ pāpaḥ kva ca guṇa-nidher janma bhavato
bhrāmyadbhir na sa ko 'pi nistuṣa-guṇo dṛṣṭo viśiṣṭo janaḥ
yasyāgre cira-sañcitāni hṛdaye duḥkhāni saukhyāni vā
saṃjalpya kṣaṇam ekam ardham athavā niḥśvasya viśrāmyate
ito vyādho dhāvaty ayam anupadaṃ vakrita-dhanuḥ
ito 'py agre tiṣṭhaty ayam ajagaro vistṛta-mukhaḥ
kva yāyāt kiṃ kuryān mṛga-śiśur ayaṃ daiva-vaśagaḥ
potopāyā iha hi bahavo laṅghanāya kṣamante
āho riktaḥ katham api bhaved eṣa daivāt tadānīṃ
ko nāma syād ataṭa-kuharālokanair yasya kalpaḥ
te tasya sapta turagā na kadācid aṣṭau
sauvarṇau na ghaṭau na nūtana-ghanāsannaḥ śaśī pārvaṇaḥ
toyaṃ nirmathitaṃ ghṛtāya madhune niṣpīḍitaḥ prastaraḥ
dugdhā seyam acetanena jaratī dugdhasyatā gardabhī
kaṣṭaṃ yat khalu dīrghayā dhana-tṛṣā nīco janaḥ sevitaḥ
naikatrārtha-mṛdutve prāyaḥ śloke ca loke ca //
yad iha jarāsv api mānmathā vikārāḥ
yad api ca na kṛtaṃ nitambinīnāṃ
dhig vṛddhatāṃ viṣalatām iva dhik tathāpi
svasti sukhebhyaḥ saṃprati salilāñjalir eṣa manmatha-kathāyāḥ /
tā api mām ativayasaṃ tarala-dṛśaḥ saralam īkṣante //
gātrair girā ca vikalaś caṭum īśvarāṇāṃ
sadyas taptaṃ śavasya jvalad iva piśitaṃ bhūri jagdhvārdha-dagdhaṃ
paśyāntaḥ pluṣyamāṇaḥ praviśati salilaṃ satvaraṃ gṛdhra-saṅghaḥ
utkṛtyotkṛtya kṛttiṃ prathamam atha pṛthūcchopha-bhūyāṃso māṃsāny
aṅka-sthād asthi-saṃstha-sthapuṭa-gatam api kravyam avyagram atti
utpuṣṇad utpuṣṇat parito nṛ-māṃsa-vighasair ādardaraṃ krandataḥ
atrāsthaḥ piśitaṃ śavasya kaṭhinair utkṛtya kṛtsnaṃ nakhair
lalaj-jihvo vaktrād galitam aparo leḍhu pibataḥ
tataḥ styānāḥ kaścid bhuvi nipatitāḥ śoṇita-kaṇāḥ
vyaktais taiḥ saṃvaladbhiḥ kṣaṇam aparam iva vyomni vṛttaṃ śmaśānam
śrutvā dāśarathī suvela-kaṭake sānandam ardhe dhanuṣ
abhyasyanti tathaiva citra-phalake laṅkā-pates tat punar
saṃtuṣṭe tisṛṇāṃ purām api ripau kaṇḍūla-dor-maṇḍala
yācñā-dainya-parāñci yasya kalahāyante mithas tvaṃ vṛṇu
tvaṃ vṛṇv ity abhito mukhāni sa daśagrīvaḥ kathaṃ kathyate
eko bhavān mama samaṃ daśa vā namanti
cāpaṃ gṛhāṇa sadṛśaṃ kṣaṇam astu yuddham
re vṛddha-gṛdhra kim akāṇḍam iha pravīra
vaktreṣv ekam api svayaṃ sa bhagavān tan me pramāṇaṃ śivaḥ
devo yady api te guruḥ sa bhagavān ardhendu-cūḍāmaṇiḥ
kṣoṇī-maṇḍalam ekaviṃśatim idaṃ vārān jitaṃ yady api
draṣṭavyo 'sy amum eva bhārgava-baṭaḥ kaṇṭhe kuṭhāraṃ vahan
kārāveśmani puṣpakasya ca jayo yasyedṛśaḥ kelayaḥ
kā ślāghā ghuṇa-jarjareṇa dhanuṣā kṛṣṭena bhagnena vā
yenaiṣa me na gaṇito yudhi candrahāsaḥ
rāme rudra-śarāsanaṃ tulayati smitvā sthitaṃ pārthivaiḥ
tvaṃ kūrmarāja tad idaṃ dvitayaṃ dadhīthāḥ
lāṅgūlena gabhastimān valayitaḥ protaḥ śaśī maulinā
jīmūtā vidhutāḥ śaṭābhir uḍavo daṃṣṭrābhir āsāditāḥ
laṅkeśasya ca laṅghito diśi diśi krūraḥ pratāpānalaḥ
yo yaḥ kṛtto daśamukha-bhujas tasya tasyaiva vīryaṃ
labdhvā dṛpyanty adhikam adhikaṃ bāhavaḥ śiṣyamāṇāḥ
yady acchinnaṃ daśamukha-śiras tasya tasyaiva kāntau
bhagnaṃ deva samasta-vānara-bhaṭair naṣṭaṃ ca yūthādhipaiḥ
kiṃ dhairyeṇa puro vilokaya daśagrīvo 'yam ārād abhūt
tenākekaram īkṣitaṃ daśa śanair bāṇān ṛjūkurvatā
yenāsyāḥ paridhānam apy apahṛtaṃ rājñāṃ gurūṇāṃ puraḥ
harir alasa-vilocanaḥ sagarvaṃ balam avalokya punar jagāma nidrām /
yat saṃkhyeṣu cakāra śīkara-kaṇair eva dviṣāṃ durdinam
gīrvāṇendra-phaṇīndrayor api dadau śaṅkāṃ viśaṅko 'pi yaḥ
mainākaḥ kim ayaṃ ruṇaddhi gagane man-mārgam avyāhataṃ
śaktis tasya kutaḥ sa vajra-patanād bhīto mahendrād api
tārkṣyaḥ so 'pi samaṃ nijena vibhunā jānāti māṃ rāvaṇaṃ
vijñātaṃ sa jaṭāyur eṣa jarasā kliṣṭo vadhaṃ vāñchati
putras tvaṃ tripura-druhaḥ punar ahaṃ śiṣyaḥ kim etāvatā
tulyaḥ so 'pi kṛtas tavāyam adhikaḥ kodaṇḍa-dīkṣā-vidhiḥ
tad bhoḥ skanda gṛhāṇa kārmukam idaṃ nirṇīyatām antaram
vīra-śrīr iva yasya vakṣasi jagad-vīrasya viśrāmyatu
yasyodyoge balānāṃ sakṛd api calatām ujjihānai rajobhir
dvitrāvaskanda-mandaḥ katham api calati syandano bhānavīyaḥ
yan nistriṃśa-hatodgatair ari-śiraś cakrair babhūva kṣaṇaṃ
pāṣāṇa-prakaraḥ kṛto 'yam akhilaḥ kṣīṇo girīṇāṃ gaṇaḥ
arthibhyo vasu varṣatā punar asau saṃrūḍha-ratnāṅkura
grahas tasyāsthāne gurur ucita-mārge sa nirataḥ
sa sarvasvaṃ dātā tṛṇam iva sureśaṃ vijayate
jīvākṛṣṭiṃ sa cakre mṛdha-bhuvi dhanuṣaḥ śatrur āsīd gatāsur
lakṣāptir mārgaṇānām abhavad ari-bale tad-yaśas tena labdham
muktā tena kṣameti tvaritam ari-gaṇair uttamāṅgaiḥ pratīṣṭhā
pañcatvaṃ dveṣi-sainye sthitam avani-patir nāpa saṃkhyāntaraṃ saḥ
lokān vācayati sma vikrama-mayim ākhyāyikām ātmanaḥ
rājñā yena salīlam utkala-pater lakṣmīḥ punar-bhūḥ kṛtā
ghātāruntudam apy aho katham ayaṃ manthācalaḥ soḍhavān
etenaiva durātmanā jalanidher utthāpya pāpām imāṃ
chāyā pītāpi yatra pratikṛtibhir upasthāpyate pādapānām
yatrākṛṣṭa-kucāṃśuke mayi ruṣā vastrāya patrāṇi te
cinvatyo vana-devatās taru-latām uccair vyadhuḥ kautukāt
vātāḥ śīkariṇo 'pi lakṣmaṇa dṛḍhaṃ saṃtāpayanty eva mām
adyāpy unmanayanti kānana-śukāḥ so 'yaṃ girir mālyavān
sīmānaḥ pradarodareṣu vivareṣv alpāmbhaso yāsv ayaṃ
yad etat svacchandaṃ virahaṇam akārpaṇyam aśanaṃ
na jāne kasyaiṣā pariṇatir udārasya tapasaḥ
manasi na mudaṃ kasyā dadhyuḥ śivā vana-bhūmayaḥ
dhīrās ta eva śama-saukhya-bhujas ta eva
krīḍā mugdha-mṛgair vayāṃsi suhṛdo naktaṃ pradīpaḥ śaśī
svādhīne 'pi dhane tathāpi kṛpaṇā yācanta ity adbhutam
gataḥ kālo yatra priya sakhi mayi prema-kuṭilaḥ
mano-vṛttis tat kiṃ vyasanini mudhaiva kṣapayasi
mātar jare maraṇam antikam ānayantyāpy antas tvayā vayam amī paritoṣitāḥ smaḥ /
nānā-sukha-vyasana-bhaṅgura-parva-pūrvaṃ dhig yauvanaṃ yad apanīya tavāvatāraḥ //
yad vaktraṃ muhur īkṣase na dhanināṃ brūṣe na cāṭuṃ mṛṣā
naiṣāṃ garva-giraḥ śṛṇoṣi na punaḥ pratyāśayā dhāvasi
kāle bāla-tṛṇāni khādasi sukhaṃ nidrāsi nidrāgame
tan me brūhi kuraṅga kutra bhavatā kiṃ nāma taptaṃ tapaḥ
kvacid vyādhi-kleśaḥ kvacid api viyogaś ca suhṛdām
iti dhyātvā hṛṣyan kṣaṇam atha vighūrṇan kṣaṇam aho
na jāne saṃsāraḥ kim amṛta-mayaḥ kiṃ viṣamayaḥ
yan muñcanty upabhoga-bhāñjy api dhanāny ekāntato niḥspṛhāḥ
na prāptāni purā na saṃprati na ca prāptau dṛḍha-pratyayoaḥ
vāñchā-mātra-parigrahāṇy api vayaṃ tyaktuṃ na tāni kṣamāḥ
yady asty evaṃ kuru bhava-rase lampaṭatvaṃ tadānīṃ
no cec cetaḥ praviśa sahasā nirvikalpe samādhau
kva viṣayāḥ kva sukhaṃ kva parigrahaḥ
niṣkandī-kṛta-śānti ye 'pi ca tapaḥ-kārā gṛheṣv āsane
taṃ vidvāṃsam iha stumaḥ kara-puṭībhikṣālpa-śāke 'pi vā
bībhatsā viṣayā jugupsitatamaḥ kāyo vayo gatvaraṃ
prāyo bandhubhir adhvanīva pathikair saṅgo viyogāvahaḥ
hātavyo 'yam asaṃstavāya visaraḥ saṃsāra ity ādikaṃ
sarvasyaiva hi vāci cetasi punaḥ puṇyātmanaḥ kasyacit
tadā dṛṣṭaṃ nārī-mayam idam aśeṣaṃ jagad api
samībhūtā dṛṣṭis tribhuvanam api brahma manute
mātar lakṣmi bhajasva kañcid aparaṃ mat-kāṅkṣiṇī mā sma bhūr
bhogebhyaḥ spṛhayālavas tava vaśāḥ kā niḥspṛhāṇām asi
bhikṣā-saktubhir eva saṃprati vayaṃ vṛttiṃ samīhāmahe
tvan-nāma smaratas tad-arpita-dṛśaḥ prāṇāḥ prayāsyanti me
vayaṃ vīta-vrīḍāḥ śuka iva paṭhāmaḥ param amī
vrajati nitarāṃ tuṣṭiṃ puṣṭaḥ śmaśāna-gataḥ śavaḥ
vaktuṃ na tv aham utsaheya kṛpaṇaṃ dehīty avadyaṃ vacaḥ
viyoge ko bhedas tyajati na jano yat svayam amūn
svayaṃ tyaktā hy ete śama-sukham anantaṃ vidadhati
bhāgyaṃ naḥ kva nu tādṛg alpa-tapasāṃ yenāṭavī-maṇḍanāḥ
syāmaḥ kṣoṇiruho dahaty avirataṃ yān eva dāvānalaḥ
etat tad vaktram atra kva tad adhara-madhu kvāyātās te kaṭākṣāḥ
kvālāpāḥ komalās te kva sa madana-dhanur-bhaṅguro bhrū-vilāsaḥ
rāgāndhānām ivoccair upahasitam aho moha-jālaṃ kapālam
iyaṃ bālā māṃ praty anavaratam indīvara-dala
prabhā-cauraṃ cakṣuḥ kṣipati kim abhipretam anayā
jvara-jvālā śāntā tad api na varākī viramati
śiśutvaṃ tāruṇyaṃ tad-anu ca dadhānāḥ pariṇatiṃ
pibanti svacchandaṃ stanam adharam ambhaḥ sukṛtinaḥ
iha hi patatāṃ nāsty ālambo na vāpi nivartanaṃ
tad api mahatāṃ ko 'yaṃ moho yad evam anākulāḥ
bhāryā me putro me dravyaṃ sakalaṃ ca bandhu-vargo me /
iti me me kurvantaṃ paśum iva baddhvā nayati kālaḥ //
diśo vāsaḥ pātraṃ kara-kuharam eṇāḥ praṇayinaḥ
samādhānaṃ nidrā śayanam avanī mūlam aśanam
sravanti kṣemaṃ te pulina kuśalaṃ bhadram upalāḥ
sura-patim api śvā pārśva-sthaṃ sa-śaṅkitam īkṣate
gaṇayati na hi kṣudro lokaḥ parigraha-phalgutām
vivekaḥ kiṃ so 'pi svarasa-valitā yatra na kṛpā
sa kiṃ yogo yasmin bhavati na parānugraha-rasaḥ
sa kiṃ dharmo yatra sphurati na para-droha-viratiḥ
śrutaṃ tat kiṃ sākṣād upaśama-padaṃ yan na nayati
kiṃ tair bhāvyaṃ mama sudivasair yatra te nirviśaṅkāḥ
kṣāntaṃ na kṣamayā gṛhocita-sukhaṃ tyaktaṃ na saṃtoṣataḥ
dhyātaṃ vittam aharniśaṃ na ca punas tattvāntaraṃ śāśvataṃ
tat tat karma kṛtaṃ yad eva munibhis tais taiḥ phalair vañcitam
hā hā tathāpi viṣayān na jahāti cetaḥ
retaḥ-śoṇitayor iyaṃ pariṇatir yad varṣma tac cābhavan
mṛtyor āmiṣam āspadaṃ guru-śucāṃ rogasya viśrāma-bhūḥ
jānann apy avaśo viveka-virahān majjann avidyāmbudhau
yadā pūrvaṃ nāsīd upari ca yadā naiva bhavitā
ataḥ saṃyoge 'smin paravati viyoge ca sahaje
kim ādhāraḥ premā kim adhikaraṇāḥ santu ca śucaḥ
no dṛṣṭavān yad asi tac chava vañcito 'si
saṃbhoktuṃ viṣayānayaṃ kila pumān saukhyāśayā vañcitaḥ
taiḥ śeṣe kṛta-kṛtyatām upagatair audāsyam ālambitaṃ
saṃpraty eṣa vidher niyoga-vaśagaḥ karmāntarair badhyate
dhatte dhāma ca dāma ca smita-lasat-kundendra-nīla-śriyoḥ
anyāpi kiṃ na sakhi bhājanam īdṛśīnāṃ
vairī na ced bhavati vepathur antarāyaḥ
keśaṭasya | (amaru 55; Skmsa.u.ka. 1175; Smvsū.mu. 86.14; Daśarūpakada.rū. 2.22, Rasārṇava-sudhākara.su. 2.191; Padyāvalīpadyā. 302; bha.ra.si. 2.4.165)
cetaḥ kātaratāṃ vimuñca jhaṭiti svāsthyaṃ samālaṃvyatā
kathābhir deśānāṃ katham api ca kālena bahunā
samāyāte kānte sakhi rajanir ardhaṃ gatavatī
sapatnīva prācī dig iyam abhavat tāvad aruṇā
vitata-kare 'py anurāgiṇi mitre koṣaṃ sadaiva mudrayataḥ /
gurur api galati vivekaḥ skhalati ca cittaṃ vinaśyati prajñā /
tvam api tatra vasann api māmakaḥ
dyām ālokayatāṃ kalāḥ kalayatāṃ chāyāḥ samācinvatāṃ
kleśaḥ kevalam aṅgulīr dalayatāṃ mauhūrtikānām ayam
dhanyā sā rajanī tad eva sudinaṃ dhanyaḥ sa eva kṣaṇo
teṣāṃ tvaṃ nidhir āgasām asahanā mānonnatā sāpy ato
gantavyaṃ bhavayā na tad gṛham iti tvaṃ vāryase yāsi cet
gāḍhaṃ mekhalayā balān niyamitaḥ karṇotpalais tāḍitaḥ
kṣiptaḥ pāda-tale tad-eka-śaraṇo manye ciraṃ sthāsyasi
jāne sāsahanā sa cāham apakṛn mayy aṅgaṇa-sthe punas
tasyāḥ saṃbhavitā sa sādhvasa-bharaḥ ko 'pi prakopāpahaḥ
kutrātmā kva ca mekhaleti galati prāyaḥ sa māna-grahaḥ
jātānantaram eva yasya madhurāṃ mūrti-śriyaṃ paśyataḥ
dhanyaṃ janma sahāmunaika-samayaṃ na prāpya taptaṃ hṛdā
sītkāraṃ śikṣayati vraṇayaty adharaṃ tanoti romāñcam /
nāgarakaḥ kim u milito na hi na hi sakhi haimanaḥ pavanaḥ //
cādya-śvo bhavitā samāgama iti prītyā pramodaś vā yaḥ
prāpte caiva samāgame sarabhasaṃ yac cumbanāliṅganāny
etat-kāma-phalaṃ tad eva surataṃ śeṣaḥ paśūnām iva
utkarṇaḥ kurute kramaṃ kari-patau krūrākṛtiḥ keśarī
saṃtrāsaṃ janayanti vindhya-bhidurā vārāṃ pravāhāḥ puraḥ
protphullaiḥ kamalaiḥ payobhir amalair nītvā parāṃ nirvṛtim
paścāt kṣīṇa-dhanāṃ bahir nija-daśāṃ dṛṣṭvā mṛṇāla-cchalād
vidyate sa na hi kaścid upāyaḥ
kṛtvāpi koṣa-pānaṃ bhramara-yuvā purata eva kamalinyāḥ /
abhilaṣati bakula-kalikāṃ madhulihi maline kutaḥ satyam //
grāme 'smin pathikāya naiva vasatiḥ pānthādhunā dīyate
rātrāv atra vivāha-maṇḍapa-tale pānthaḥ prasupto yuvā
tenodgīya khalena garjati ghane smṛtvā priyā yat-kṛtaṃ
ātape dhṛtimatā saha vadhvā yāminī-virahiṇā vihagena /
sehire na kiraṇā hima-raśmer duḥkhite manasi sarvam asahyam //
durgādhe hṛdayāmbudhau tava bhaven naḥ sūkti-gaṅgā yadi
dīnaṃ tvām anunāthati stana-yugaṃ patrāvṛtaṃ mā kṛthāḥ
varṣāḥ kardama-hetavaḥ pratidinaṃ tāpasya mūlaṃ śarad
hemante jaḍatā tathaiva śiśire 'py āyāsyate vāyunā
kālaḥ kāla iti prahṛṣyati janaḥ kālasya kā ramyatā
kālaḥ kalir jagad idaṃ na kṛtajñam ajñe
na sa virauti na cāpi na śobhate
namasyāmo devān nanu hata-vidhes te 'pi vaśagā
phalaṃ karmāyattaṃ yadi kim aparaiḥ kiṃ ca vidhinā
namaḥ sat-karmabhyo vidhir api na yebhyaḥ prabhavati
purā yātāḥ kecit tad anu calitāḥ kecid apare
viṣādaḥ ko 'smākaṃ na hi na vayam apy atra gaminaḥ
san-mārge tāvad āste prabhavati puruṣas tāvad evendriyāṇāṃ
lajjāṃ tāvad vidhatte vinayam api samālambate tāvad eva
yāval līlāvatīnāṃ na hṛdi dhṛti-muṣo dṛṣṭi-bāṇāḥ patanti
adhvany asya vadhūr viyoga-vidhurā bhartuḥ smarantī yadi
prāṇān ujjhati kasya tan mahad aho saṃjāyate kilbiṣam
ity evaṃ pathikaḥ karoti hṛdaye yāvat taror mūrdhani
prodghuṣṭaṃ para-puṣṭayā tava tavety uccair vaco 'nekaśaḥ
madana-jvaram apanetuṃ kuru saṃprati satatam auṣadha-dvitayam /
kasyā nāma kim atra nāsti viditaṃ yad vīkṣyamāṇo 'py ayaṃ
loko mūka ivāsti māṃ prati punaḥ sarvo janas tapyate
śakyaṃ darśayituṃ na pūga-phalavat kṛtvā dvidhedaṃ vapur
yat satyaṃ sakhi vīkṣitaḥ khalu mayā nūnaṃ caturthyāḥ śaśī
khurāghātaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ pratidinam alaṃ hanti pathikān
yugaṃ naiva skandhe vahati nitarāṃ yāti dharaṇīṃ
varaṃ śūnyā śālā na ca punar ayaṃ duṣṭa-vṛṣabhaḥ
na vedmi tad vastu yad atra loke
timiram idam indu-bimbāt pūtir gandho 'yam amburahakoṣāt amburuha-koṣāt /
ninditam abhijāta-mukhād yad alīkaṃ vacanam uccarati //
sotkaṇṭhaṃ sabhayaṃ ca paśyati śanair dūre sthitas tāpasaḥ
tā kṛtyākṛti-leśato manasi naḥ kiṃcit pratītaṃ gatāḥ
tāḍīdalaṃ yad akaṭhoram idaṃ yad atra
mṛṇālam etad valayī-kṛtaṃ tayā tadīya evaiṣa vataṃsa-pallavaḥ /
idaṃ ca tasyāḥ kadalī-dalāṃśukaṃ yad atra saṃkrānta iva smara-jvaraḥ //
madhur māso ramyo vipinam ajanaṃ tvaṃ ca taruṇī
vrajatv ambā mugdhe kṣaṇam iha vilambasva yadi vā
sphuṭas tāvaj jātaḥ piśuna-vacasām eṣa viṣayaḥ
na cec cintā-pātre milati katham apy asya manasaḥ
śunīm abhyeti śvā hatam api nihanty eva madanaḥ
ciraṃ ruddha-śvāsaḥ sa khalu punar eteṣu viralaḥ
subandhau bhaktir naḥ ka iha raghukāre na ramate
tathāpy antar modaṃ kam api bhavabhūtir vitanute
pātu karṇa-rasāyanaṃ racayituṃ vācaḥ satāṃ saṃmatāṃ
vyutpattiṃ paramām avāptum avadhiṃ labdhuṃ rasa-srotasaḥ
bhoktuṃ svādu phalaṃ ca jīvita-taror yady asti te kautukaṃ
tad bhrātaḥ śṛṇu rājaśekhara-kaveḥ sūktīḥ sudhā-syandanīḥ
devīṃ vācam upāsate hi bahavaḥ sāraṃ tu sārasvataṃ
jānīte nitarām asau gurukula-kliṣṭo murāriḥ kaviḥ
ābdhar laṅghita eva vānara-bhaṭaiḥ kiṃ tv asya gambhīratām
dhig dhik tān samayān pariśrama-rujo dhik tā giro niṣphalā
anudghuṣṭaḥ śabdair atha ca ghaṭanātaḥ sphuṭa-rasaḥ
śabdās te na tathā-vidhāḥ pathi dhiyāṃ lokasya ye nāsate
nārthātmāpi sa ko 'pi dhāvati girāṃ bhūpāla-mārge na yaḥ
asty anyas tu sa saṃniveśa-śiśiraḥ śabdārthayoḥ saṃgamo
yenāmī sva-vaśena dagdha-kavayo mathnanti cetāṃsi naḥ
idaṃ kāvyaṃ tattvaṃ sphurati tu yad atrāṇu paramaṃ
tad antar-buddhīnāṃ sphuṭam atha ca vācām aviṣayaḥ
lasad bhūyo bhāvā mṛdur api vimardocita-tanuḥ
ambā yena sarasvatī sutavatī tasyārpayantī rasān
tān dṛṣṭvārtham itas tato nikhanati svaṃ niḥsvam ātanvatī
yal lagnaṃ hṛdi puṃsāṃ bhūyo bhūyaḥ śiro na ghūrṇayati /
tad api kaveḥ kim u kāvyaṃ kāṇḍo vā dhanvināṃ kim asau //
kaścid vācaṃ racayitum alaṃ śrotum evāparas tāṃ
kalyāṇī te matur ubhayato vismayaṃ nas tanoti
na hy ekasmin atiśayavatāṃ saṃnipāto guṇānāṃ
mataṃ ced asmākaṃ kavir amara-siṃho vijayate
iyaṃ gaur uddāmā tava niviḍa-bandhāpi hi kathaṃ
na vaidarbhād anyat carati sulabhatve 'pi hi katham
avandhyā ca khyātā bhuvi katham agamyā kavi-vṛṣaiḥ
kathaṃ vā pīyūṣaṃ sravati bahu dugdhāpi bahubhiḥ
śailair bandhayati sma vānara-hṛtair vālmīkir ambhonidhiṃ
vyāsaḥ pārtha-śarais tathāpi na tayor atyuktir udbhāvyate
vāg arthau ca tulādhṛtāv iva tathāpy asman-nibandhānayaṃ
loko dūṣayituṃ prasārita-mukhas tubhyaṃ pratiṣṭhe namaḥ
hā kaṣṭaṃ kavi-cakra-mauli-maṇinā dakṣeṇa yan nekṣitaḥ
yasya yathā vijñānaṃ tādṛk tasyeha hṛdaya-sad-bhāvaḥ /
vahati na puraḥ kaścit paścān na ko 'py anuyāti māṃ
na ca nava-pada-kṣuṇṇo mārgaḥ kathaṃ nv aham ekakaḥ
sa khalu bahulo vāmaḥ panthā mayā sphuṭam urjitaḥ
ślāghyāṃ sutām iva tataḥ śriyam aprasūya
dhik taṃ manuṣya-padam ātmani yaḥ prayuṅkte
ye nāma kecid iha naḥ prathayanty avajñāṃ
jānanti te kim api tān prati naiṣa yatnaḥ
kālo hy ayaṃ niravadhir vipulā ca lakṣmīḥ
prakṛtyā gambhīraḥ kavir iha sa-śabdo vijayate
unnīto bhava-bhūtinā pratipadaṃ bāṇe gate yaḥ purā
yaś cīrṇaḥ kamalāyudhena suciraṃ yenāgamat keśaṭaḥ
diṣṭyā ślāghya-guṇasya kasyacid asau mārgaḥ samunmīlati
viśrānto rasa-bhāgas timitayati yathā gabhīrimā ko 'pi //
vālmīker mukulīkṛtaiva kavitā kaḥ stotum asty ādaro
kāvyaṃ ced avataṃsa-bhūpam abhajad dharmāyaṇaṃ karṇayos
tātaḥ kiṃ bahu varṇyate sa bhagavān vaidarbha-garbheśvaraḥ
